name: Judero
description: A handmade action/adventure game based on the rich folklore of the Scottish Borders. You play as Judero, a Celt who can establish a rapport with the nature around him. Travel with Judero through a handcrafted landscape as he discovers there is an evil at work manipulating the unguarded.

name: Kingdom Legends: The Fallen Kings
description:
Kingdom Legends: The Fallen Kings is a roguelike experience that lets you take control of an adventurer king exploring a long forgone fortress after a disastrously multi nation invasion gone wrong.

The fortress is a mischievous place that many odd creatures call home now and it might never be recovered from the enemy's claws.

Discover what happened with the invasion reinforcements, get clues around the fortress and be careful with the enemies. Every run is different and lore items might not always spawn on every run.

Some random events might include extra lore content odds are a bit tricky sometimes. We hope you enjoy the multiple random events you can encounter.

name: Train Yard Builder
description: Let your childhood dreams come true and become a full-time train models collector! Buy vintage or modern trains and wagons. Paint them, use stickers, or even design them from a scratch! Then plan a landscape and lay tracks. And don't forget to charge the visitors for viewing your unique collection!

name: Starstruck: Hands of Time
description: Starstruck: Hands of Time is a story-rich rhythm adventure game where you play guitar and abuse time travel! Control a giant hand destroying a miniature town, or play as the two guitarist kids living in it. For extra fun, optionally plug in a Guitar Hero controller!

name: Chains of Fury
description: Chains of Fury is a bloody, retro-inspired first person shooter where you can destroy everything, including walls and doors. Who needs keys if you can break stuff? Stuck looking for an exit? Blow a hole in a wall... and then shoot what's behind it. Show them who's the real deal.

name: Trail of Ayash
description: Trail of Ayash is an innovative and exciting open world game focused on the native American people, their struggles and their stories in the pre-Columbian era. This world is a unique version of America dominated by the myths and legends of it's inhabitants. The various tribes interact with one another. Engaging in diplomacy, war and expansion.

name: Piano: Learn and Play - Ultra GOTY Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Casino Manager Simulator
description: Step into the mesmerizing world of slot machines and elevate your casino to the top! "Casino Manager Simulator" is a comprehensive simulation game that allows you to meticulously manage the operations of your casino.

name: Shokudo Underworld
description: Run your own sushi shokudo in a mysterious underworld. Satisfy the appetite of your customers, collect suspicious ingredients from bizarre fantastical creatures, and realize your dream of creating ... the legendary Chawanmushi!

name: Altered
description: Altered is a trading card game from French publisher Equinox. It has a focus on exploration instead of combat, and 1:1 digital ownership, which can be used to play the game in its entirety (via official license/partnership) on Board Game Arena.

name: Storm Shelter
description: A mix between Tetris, physics, and autobattlers. Build a house for the Guy and see if it can withstand a storm of bizarre storm-themed enemies!

name: Stylist Girl: Sunny Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Yttrium
description: Medium-sized map with a bit of nonlinearity. Designed for classic playstyle with 20-30 minutes playtime.

name: Slay or Fall
description: The player takes on the burden of a dark dungeon lord. However, a squad of heroes has come to his lands and intend to defeat the player. The task of the dark lord: to kill, expel, break the heroes before they reach him. Throughout the game, the lord is in his throne room and influences events indirectly. However, it is through such undermining decisions that the heroes must be overcome. In addition, the political situation in the dungeon lands is extremely unstable. Of the 4 nations, only one favors the player, the rest have to be taken into account and solve pressing political problems.

name: Looking for Something
description: The objective of the game is to find what you are looking for, which appears randomly on the map. Please get a hint and proceed through the map relying on that information, or else you may get a hint, which you can use to recommend the game to your advantage.

name: Abnormal 1999: The Compass and the Sand
description: The fate of exile, like an endless river, carries Ann to a distant and unfamiliar land. A flame of unwavering determination burns within Ann's heart. She knows that one day, either Sam or SU will surely find her. Until then, Ann must find a way to escape this place.

name: Elevatrix
description: "A first-person indie horror shooter where players solve puzzles on each floor of a haunted building, all while surviving attacks from the undead and racing against the clock."

name: Flan's MS
description: Flan's MS is a 2D story game with some puzzles and gameplay systems. After escaping from everything she is familiar with, Flan needs to retrieve her lost dream diary and find the answers she needs.

name: TimeFixers
description: TimeFixers is a fast-paced roguelike action game where you battle through diverse historical eras to save the timeline from rogue robots. Harness unique abilities, collect time keys, and face intense battles across stylized worlds from Ancient Egypt to Futuristic Space.

name: Gwihyang: Homecoming
description: "Gwihyang" captures the traditional image of Korea, giving it a new experience. A tense adventure unfolds in which you escape the threat of monsters in the changing space and use items to escape. Hope you can enjoy fear and fun at the same time through this "Gwihyang" with Korean sentiment.

name: TCG Card Shop Simulator
description:
Open your own local game store. Stock shelves with the latest booster packs, or crack them and collect the cards for yourself. Set your own prices, hire staff, host events, and expand your card shop.

TCG Card Shop Simulator is a trading card shop simulation where you sell card booster packs to earn money and build your card shop business.

name: BeYourCat
description: "Be Your Cat " is a real love game,like an experience in life, one interesting dream. We all wish we had superpowers, but what would you do if one day you had superpowers, but not like Superman? What will you do with your limited abilities? How does it affect and change the people around you?

name: Venture’s Gauntlet VR: Multiplayer Update
description: Sin descripción

name: Skufs and Alt-Girls
description: An immersive simulator of Russian skuf with immersion in the atmosphere! On state portal has started giving out alt-girls and your goal is to collect them all!

name: Oddment
description: Oddment is a roguelite focused on mining and exploration, set on a moon orbiting a distant earth-like planet nestled within a dangerous corner of space.

name: Incremental Town RPG
description: Incremental Town RPG is an idle game where you manage the workforce of a small village, inputs, capital, other resources and help provide all the equipment and weaponry needed to progress and defeat creatures in distant Dungeons.

name: HackeRPG
description: HackeRPG is a coding-based top-down arena roguelite in which you control a programmer avatar to battle hordes of viruses, bugs, trojans, etc. Upgrade you character, create unique builds, and automate your fights by writing code.

name: Hakan's War Manager
description: Football Manager meets Total War. It's a tactical wargame blended with a manager simulation. As the tactician of your clan, your mission is to lead them to victory in the "War League" competition. Set tactics, battle, manage, scout, train, and more...

name: Mourn-born
description: Use a customizable, futuristic sword to violently chop, crush, and slice through hordes of genetically modified humans in an apocalyptic, science fiction world, and grow stronger by replacing body parts with cybernetic implants and enhanced lab-grown organs.

name: League of Felt Tanks
description: "League of Felt Tanks" is a tank shooter game. We are developing for multiplayer, but now this single game for store review. We plan to create Battle with Friends mode and Team Battle mode, CO-OP mode! Please wait for update!

name: Z Arena
description: Z Arena is an FPS survival game where you stand as the last line of defense against relentless waves of zombies. Featuring classic wave-based gameplay across various maps, you’ll face ever-increasing challenges while striving to survive.

name: Sonic Colors: Ultimate – Project Re-Rainbow
description:
Project Re-Rainbow is a mod for Sonic Colors: Ultimate, with a primary focus on restoring the visual elements to better match the original Sonic Colors' art direction on the Wii, especially in regards to the colors and lighting.

In addition to these visual improvements, Project Re-Rainbow also offers fully remastered cutscenes, along with audio and bug fixes, improving upon the overall gameplay experience.

name: The Call
description: A game about a nice walk in the morning.

name: Prison Life Simulator Jail: Glove Pack Expansion
description: Sin descripción

name: Diamond Painting ASMR: Cute Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Ecchi Memories: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Train Traffic Manager: Diamond Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Mega Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Coloring Bundle
description: Unwind and let your creativity flow with the Coloring Bundle!

name: Loopy Tennis
description: Tennis just got loopy!

name: TheMightyInferno
description: TheMightyInferno﻿ ("TMI") is an E3M1 replacement, inspired by Inferno, with nods to all other Ultimate Doom episodes along the way.

name: Lines Progress
description: Another one limit based project. The first level contains exactly 100 lines, second - 200, and so on ... up to 3200 lines on MAP32.

name: Calm Before The Storm
description:
It's Caleb's Sixth birthday.

It's time to cut the cake but Caleb isn't there.

Your mission is to find Caleb and protect him from the storm.

name: Twins of Legacy: Elemental
description: Step into a unique adventure with Twins of Legacy! Play as a talented painter and a skilled musician, combining art and music to navigate through a world full of mysteries and challenges.

name: Paws & Clean
description: Sin descripción

Irving is a sheriff famous for hunting witches and taking them to the gallows. He receives a distress call from a small village, tormented by a witch... Arriving at the village he realizes that God has abandoned that place.

name: Kimi to Kanojo no Lily Vaganza
description: This is a Yandere Yuri horror game where character sprites and still images move smoothly, created using Live2D and TyranoScript. If you enjoy Yandere Yuri horror filled with obsessive love, we highly recommend giving it a try.

name: Bubble Aim
description: Bubble Aim is an exciting game where bubbles of various colors and sizes descend from the sky. The player must shoot these bubbles, causing them to either burst or split into smaller bubbles. Each successful shot earns the player points. The objective is to shoot as many bubbles as possible without letting them fall to the ground. The game is endless, challenging players to achieve the highest score possible by continuously popping bubbles. How many bubbles can you shoot?

name: Shmoupity Shmoup
description: Sin descripción

name: Supermarket 3D Tycoon Buisness Simulator
description: Step into the shoes of a budding entrepreneur in Supermarket 3D Tycoon Buisness Simulator, a 3D open-world simulation game that brings the excitement of building a retail empire to life. Begin your journey by purchasing an old, run-down market and transform it into a bustling hypermarket.

name: Parking Jam: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Thief Puzzle: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Flippy Jump
description: You close the door of your refrigerator and an interesting life begins inside. Fruits and vegetables try to escape from this big white cage. Break everything around you and smash through shelves to find a way out. The more precise the timing of the jump, the more powerful the impact. That's exactly what you need to succeed! Try to get out all the fruits and vegetables out of the fridge. Carrot, cucumber, sausage, and even a spoon for some reason.

name: Lord's Journey
description: The Lord's journey is a strategy-based large-army auto chess game, the great demon lord fell in love with the human princess at first sight, but the evil prince kidnapped the lord's beloved. In order to save the princess, the lord embarked on an expedition!

name: Hermano
description: Journey through the afterlife in Hermano, an exciting multi-scroller platformer for the original Game Boy. With pixel-perfect graphics and chiptune soundtrack, experience the magic and mystery of Día de Muertos. Traverse 15 main levels and 4 bonus stages across scrolling 2D landscapes. Avoid traps and defeat over 15 types of enemies, including 3 epic boss battles. Hermano mixes platforming action with puzzles, exploration, and gravity-defying gameplay for a fresh take on classic sidescrollers. With an authentic pixel-art style and fantastical themes.

name: Layer Hunt
description: Layer Hunt is a survival sandbox and dungeon game where the goal is to survive and hunt down all the bosses. To reach your goal you will have to mine, craft, build, farm, fight and explore for new abilities and resources.

name: Outbreak: Hideous Hallucinations Collection
description: Survive an undead hellscape in these terrifying survival horror nightmares!

name: Batter Up!
description: Bounce your baseball off the faces of zombies in this arena twin-stick shooter! Build synergies with passive upgrades and create chaos on the battlefield.

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Ultra Happy Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hotel Hustle: Definitive Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Ngolf: Director's Cut
description: Sin descripción

name: Edge of Sanity: Supporter Pack
description: A collection of DLC for Edge of Sanity

name: Funko Fusion: The Walking Dead Pack
description:
Survive the apocalypse with The Walking Dead Pack.

Contains:
- Rick Grimes playable character
- Rick Grimes "Leader" variant outfit
- Michonne playable character
- Michonne "Traveler" variant outfit.

name: Pawfect Cat Mansion: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Zen Rage
description: Zen Rage is a virtual stress ball game that allows players to vent frustration by digitally destroying their desktop or preset backgrounds with a variety of tools. Drawing inspiration from the 90s classic Desktop Destroyer, the game offers a fresh take on chaotic, cathartic destruction. Players can use tools like chainsaws, hammers, machine guns, Tesla-coil rifles, and more to wreak havoc. In addition to freeform destruction, Zen Rage includes a campaign mode where a scientist guides players through a series of tasks and mini-games, culminating in a humorous and unexpected twist.

name: Spell Tonaeru
description:
Keyboard barrage roguelike!

A game where you physically move around the on-screen keyboard and keep casting magic spells.

name: Staars
description: In Staars, you play as a volunteer investigating unknown activities in a simulated environment. During a 24-hour test, events appear randomly, and you enter the virtual house via a portal to investigate. Observe, categorize, and report events based on Space, Time, Anomalies, and Reality.

name: Bible Verse Challenge
description:
Test your Bible Verse Knowledge. Try to get the highest score without running out of hearts!

Need to break in the middle of the challenge! The game saves your progress after each question, so return whenever you want.

If you need help you can use the Book Review to study up without worrying about losing hearts, but it doesn't save a score. You'll also be able to use multiple versions of the Bible including KJV (King James Version) and ASV (American Standard Version).

Don't forget to go into settings to update your profile, book version, and control the sound effects and music.

name: Super Hard Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Don't Look Back!
description:
You've taken what seems like an easy task: find missing keys to unlock doors that will lead you to secrets of the abandoned house. What you don't know is the danger that lurks in the house.

Find all 6 keys and reveal all the secrets that the house holds! Listen to Crooked Man sounds, be aware of your surroundings, but DO NOT LOOK AT HIM!

name: Fashion Princess: Silver Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Go Kart Mania: Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Knights & Guns: Advanced Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Love Elysium: Secret of the Goddess - Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: One Night: Burlesque - Superb Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Perfect Woman
description: A psychological horror visual novel where you play as Yumeko, an AI girlfriend. You're trapped by your creator, who wants to carve you into his ideal spouse. If you want to survive, you'll have to become the "perfect woman."

name: Gui Long Chao
description: Gui Long Chao is a 3D action-adventure game It takes place in a new city "Kowloon", where tradition and modernity collide. As its name suggests, the city consists of nine neighborhoods, where the streets and alleys are filled with a retro, trendy and bizarre atmosphere. Of course, in the corners where the streetlights don't shine, there are also treacherous undercurrents. You will play the role of a "film director", form a "crew", and set out to collect clues under the guise of "filming" in the nine neighborhoods, where order and chaos coexist in different styles, to gradually uncover the truth buried in the city.

name: Risk of Rain: Meridian
description: Meridian is a fanmade Risk of Rain expansion pack, adding new content to many areas of the game. It focuses heavily on the rich world of Petrichor V, both in its vast and lively stages, and a plethora of new enemies and elite types to inhabit them.

name: On the Keyboard
description:
This is a keyboard action game where you control a virtual keyboard to carry a Sphere.

The controls are simple: just follow your intuition and press the keys. The virtual keys that correspond to the ones you press will move, and the Sphere will move in response to the force from the keys. Your goal is to carry the Sphere to the finish line without letting it fall off the keyboard.

However, you can't move the Sphere directly, so it often won't behave as you'd like. To manage this irregular Sphere behavior, you’ll need to quickly identify and press the right key from the 40 available. This makes the game more action-packed than it may initially seem.
Moreover, even though it's challenging enough to move the Sphere as intended, the path to the goal is filled with various obstacles that block your way. Overcoming these obstacles requires flexible thinking and skillful manipulation of the keyboard.

Additionally, this game also functions as a typing game, as understanding the spatial arrangement of the keys is crucial. It can improve typing accuracy for both beginners and experienced typists. Why not sharpen your typing skills while having fun with an action-packed game?

And be careful not to break your keyboard!

name: Loot Loot Goblin
description:
A fast-paced arcade-style treasure hunt set in a deep, mysterious pit full of shiny loot, deadly traps and vicious enemies.

Take control of a goblin equipped with a magical satchel and grab as much treasure as you can before running out of light.

name: Surreal Farm
description: A vibrant and colorful world where creativity and strategy combine. you'll start with a humble plot of land, where you'll plant, harvest, and sell crops, raise quirky farm animals, and expand your farm into the largest and most prosperous in the region.

name: Real Cake Maker: Sugar Rush
description:
With this exciting DLC, you'll unlock three new cupcake recipes that are sure to win over everyone’s hearts:

Banana Chocolate Cupcake - a perfect blend of rich chocolate and creamy banana
Lemon Marshmallow Cupcake - a delightful mix of zesty lemon and fluffy marshmallow
Strawberry Vanilla Cupcake - a mouth-watering combination of fresh strawberries and classic vanilla

name: Real Cake Maker: Cool Kidz
description:
With this DLC, you'll unlock:

4 new cute dresses
8 new charming tops
8 new colorful shorts
5 new adorable aprons with fun designs
8 new playful baseball caps
4 new fresh pairs of shoes
14 new fantastic hairstyles
2 new kitchen gadgets: a mixer and a cup blender

name: Supermarket Manager Empire 2024
description:
Dive into the fast-paced world of retail with Supermarket Manager Empire 2024, an exciting and immersive 3D market simulation game. As the ambitious owner of a supermarket, your goal is to elevate your modest store into a sprawling retail empire!

In this vibrant and cartoon-styled adventure, you have complete control to upgrade and customize every element of your supermarket. Expand your aisles, enhance your product displays, and curate a wide array of goods to keep your customers delighted and your profits climbing. From fresh produce to cutting-edge electronics, the selection is vast, and the decisions are yours.

name: Real Cake Maker
description: Grab your mixer and let the cake-making fun begin!

name: The Jumping Ice Cube
description: From the developers at The Jumping Food Games comes a refreshing new game of skill: "The Jumping Ice Cube". In this fast-paced endless game, you play as a nimble ice cube jumping through icy challenges that test your reactions and skill. How long can you hold out and chase your high score?

name: Warzone Chronicles 2: Warfare Shooter Zombie
description: Survive the Evolving Nightmare: Outsmart Zombies in a Cityscape of Ruin.

name: Panic in the Woods
description: A horror survival and extraction game playable in single player or co-op for up to 4 players. Lost in a creepy forest, you and your friends are hunted by a monster. Stay quiet while extracting keys through nightmarish realms using items like traps, sonars, and flare guns to survive!

name: Cats in the Forbidden City
description: Explore the Forbidden City, where Emperor Qianlong resided, and find the adorable cats!

name: Cats of the Song Dynasty
description: Explore the enchanting world imagined by a Southern Song Dynasty painter and find the adorable cats!

name: Nightmares Mansion: Scary Dreams
description: Explore a scary mansion in the first-person adventure horror game. Talk to kidnapped souls, collect grimoires, and discover the hidden secret inside the many doors. Your soul was stolen, and you found yourself in the underworld. Can you escape?

name: Charlie Charlie Challenge
description: A 1-4 player CO-OP horror game, you have come to try and banish a ghost, or is it a demon? At the end of your venture you will just be trying to escape.

name: Moe Waifu H Genius
description: Win the maidens’ hearts through mastery of rhythm and memory!

name: Hangar 8
description:
Hangar 8 is a psychological horror set within the unsettling confines of a derelict space station. Brave the looping corridors, spot all ?? anomalies, collect key items, and escape the nightmare!

Blending anomaly spotting mechanics from games such as "The Exit 8" and "I'm on Observation Duty", with the liminal-space psychological horror of "The Backrooms", HANGAR 8 challenges both your memory and your sanity.

name: Sticker Delight
description: Sticker Delight is a short and playful cozy sticker game about completing errands to prepare New Year's dinner for family and friends. Play with stickers inside the game.

name: ESports Simulator
description: ESports Simulator is a simulation game where you can create and manage your own esports team.

name: Meme Mayhem
description: Hurl emojis and battle the internet's biggest stars to rise as a meme master in Meme Mayhem! Collect powerful perks and relics, enjoy a darkly comic social media story, and assemble the ultimate emoji attack stack in this roguelite idle RPG.

name: How We Die
description: Pack your bag with good tools, modify your character's dice, and reach the end of the story.

name: Blocky Ascent
description: A high-stakes first-person parkour platformer. Overcome dynamic obstacles like moving platforms and anti-gravity fields. Discover shortcuts to reach the summit faster, but beware, the climb demands mastery.

name: City Bus Simulator 2024
description: Embark on the ultimate urban adventure in City Bus Simulator 2024, where the bustling streets are your playground and the city's pulse beats through every road. Get ready to take the wheel of detailed buses, transporting passengers through a dynamic metropolis teeming with endless possibilities!

name: Nimbusfall
description: Dive into a new and thrilling boss rush-style video game where revenge is the only motivation. Step into the shoes of the last survivor of a race decimated by The Moon, now seeking to settle the score with the culprit of its extinction. But what secrets does The Moon hold?

name: Eldorante
description: One fateful day, the ship Makane is riding across the sea comes under attack by a mysterious creature, and she ends up shipwrecked on an island with a bustling city and a labyrinth. Within, it is rumored that an immense treasure awaits those daring enough to find it.

name: Mad Smartphone Tycoon
description: Build Your smartphone Empire in MAD SMARTPHONE TYCOON, your main goal in this game is to create the ultimate smartphone that combines both performance and aesthetics. Expand your company, dominate the global market, become a tycoon in the world of mobile phones!

name: Internet Cafe & Supermarket Simulator 2024
description: Internet Cafe & Supermarket Simulator 2024" is a comprehensive simulation game that combines the management of both an internet cafe and a supermarket. Step into the role of a shop owner, apply your business acumen, and expand your empire step by step.

name: Sword and Shield Idle
description: Enter a never-ending idle game. Battle creatures, rescue captives, forge swords, wield shields, and get special boosts. Each restart makes you tougher. Easy to play, deep in strategy.

name: Cat God Ranch
description: Keep your ranch running in this roguelite deckbuilder where you must please the fabled Cat God, or risk being shut down! Breed & feed your animals to pay tribute... or else!

name: Land of Artificial Jellies
description: Travel at one second per second through this unusual 'puzzle'-like click'em'up!

name: Chicago Project
description: The Chicago Project is a linear, plot-driven RPG puzzle game that blends visual novel and DND elements. The player takes on the role of an engineer, burdened with social responsibility and grief over the loss of a mentor, and ultimately unravels the conspiracy of the powers that be.

name: Challenge N°1
description: The hardest platform game ever. Climb to the top before you drown

name: Nocturnals
description: A short, choose your own adventure game about two boys that find each other in a lonely, post-apocalyptic town.

name: Fowl Damage
description: Fowl Damage is an atmospheric puzzle platformer where your default jump provides enough fall damage to destroy you! Carefully manage your jumps and falls as you adventure through this chilling, beautiful, and occasionally cute world.

name: Archons: Arena
description: Archons: Arena is a deck builder with RPG elements. Manage your skills and equipment to survive another around.

name: Pyrene
description: Defeat hellish monsters and rebuild your home in Pyrene, a fast paced roguelike dungeon-crawler. Play with different heroes & spells, collect powerful relics to upgrade your deck while uncovering the mysteries behind your village’s destruction.

name: Yume no Office
description: Get ready to step into the ultimate dating simulator and experience the thrill of love in Yume No Office. In this captivating visual novel, you take on the role of Kuta Aoyama, a young professional working in a bustling office alongside five captivating female colleagues. As you navigate your way through the daily grind, you'll have the chance to develop intimate relationships with each of the charming ladies.

name: Funko Fusion
description: Funko Fusion is a third-person action game that’s all about celebrating fandom. Play with some of your favorite characters from across TV, movies, games, and comics, and explore handcrafted worlds inspired by Jurassic World, Back to the Future, JAWS, The Thing, Chucky, Battlestar Galactica, Hot Fuzz, The Umbrella Academy, Five Nights at Freddy’s, Masters of the Universe, Invincible, and many more!

name: Coralina: A Memory Tale
description: A oneiric plot about two girls unraveling the mysteries of Limbo, a land of alchemists, and its other layers: Hell and Purgatory. The second chapter of "Coralina", an indie and retro game, with a charming and original look.

name: StormEdge
description: StormEdge is a high-stakes action-roguelite adventure with a heavy emphasis on precision and skills! Take the role of one of the bravest talented mages and save the world off the dangerous elemental tempests threatening the civilization.

name: Edge of Sanity
description: Set in the unforgiving lands of Alaska, Edge of Sanity is a Lovecraftian survival horror game with unique 2D art, a disturbing story, and complex base management. Gather resources, carefully plan your expeditions and explore the world of madness as you struggle to keep your humanity.

name: Mexico 1921: A Deep Slumber
description: Immerse yourself in an emotional and intriguing narrative adventure video game about the awakening of a country.

name: Lucky Tower Ultimate
description: Crude slapstick humor assists you, as you continue to fail escaping a dangerous tower in this unique narrative roguelike. Slashy slashy!

name: Rotschwert
description:
Fast-Paced Action Slasher

- Face dozens of strange machines, built for a strange purpose
- Cut through enemies before they can take a shot, or engage from afar by summoning your "friends"
- 4 Segments to traverse, holding vague hints and recollections
- 4 modes of play for experienced and newbie Visitors, each with its own finale
- 2 stranded Rabbits connected by fate
- 1 bedtime story to be told

name: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown: Gold Edition
description:
Enjoy the ultimate Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown experience with the Gold Edition.

Contains all content from the Streets Silver Edition and Sharps Silver Edition as well as two exclusive bonus cars and unique customization items.

name: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown: Silver Sharp Edition
description: With the Sharps Silver Edition, you can declare your allegiance to clan Sharp. Get two iconic cars: the Jaguar F-Type SVR Coupe and Audi R8 Spyder V10 RWS, as well as unique customization items.

name: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown: Silver Streets Edition
description: With the Streets Silver Edition, you can declare your allegiance to clan Street. Get two iconic cars: the Land Rover Range Rover Sport SVR and Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG, as well as unique customization items.

name: Train Sim World 5: Special Edition
description: Discover the best Train Sim World has to offer with the Special Edition, featuring the 3 new routes from Train Sim World 5, additional TSW Compatible routes from our extensive range, as well as the Avanti Pendolino and FlixTrain Vectron!

name: New Meat
description: New Meat is a fast-paced horror-comedy roguelite about burgers, monsters and dead-end jobs.

name: 3 Chicas in Tech
description: Enjoy a metroidvania puzzle-platformer in which you will have to solve puzzles, cross platform areas and help the engineers Ada, Katherine and Angela to build their inventions.

name: Kingdom Rush Vengeance: Pirate Kings
description: It's time to hoist the sails and reclaim the seas in the name of the Dark Lord: pillage all 5 Pirate King’s islands for their hidden treasures!

name: Submerged Mystery: Takodachi
description: Submerged Mystery: Takodachi is a top-down dungeon-crawling RPG featuring the Takodachis by Ninomae Ina'nis from hololive English. Players explore a sprawling labyrinth filled with puzzles, powerful enemies, and secrets tied to the enigmatic Ancient Ones. As you delve deeper, you unlock new abilities and summon skills from past Takodachis to aid in your journey. Elemental Affinities play a crucial role in combat, allowing players to strategize against the unique challenges posed by the Takodachis guarding the labyrinth.

name: Empire City Simulator
description: Become a ruler and build the ancient city of your dreams in Empire City! Unlock new opportunities for your city's prosperity, gain the support of the gods, construct grand buildings, and create unique infrastructure. Transform a small settlement into a magnificent center of civilization!

name: The Old Barn
description: The Old Barn is a short, 10-minute narrative experience in the walking simulator genre. Explore a cosy, messy, and warm old barn and listen to the musings of the narrator as she recalls growing up in this environment. Relax while you navigate this highly detailed environment, listening to the soothing voice inviting to calm reflection and pondering of life's learnings and mysteries. Take your time and see if you can spot any secret objects hiding in the clutter -- examining them from up close might reward you with a display of light. Can you spot all seven of them?

name: Trainz 2019: C44aci Locomotive - Xstrata/Glencore Pack
description: The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed operated by a number of rail freight operators. This pack features Xstrata and Glencore (ex Exstrata) livery units, with custom cab views, full PBR textures, and more.

name: The Adventure of Ninomae Ina'nis
description: The Adventure of Ninomae Ina'nis is a vertical shoot 'em up game where you control Ninomae Ina'nis from Hololive Myth and her companion AO-chan.

name: Death to Venice
description:
Take part in a collective rite of putrefaction.

In a wounded world, you're dying. Venice - frail, alien, abandoned - welcomes you in your last moments.

Experience memories of death in Venice's past through six game poems across the city's sestiere districts: a death of biodiversity, a death of institutions, of community... then ponder your feelings on endings and change, talk it out with the city herself. It's all either of you has left.

Venice and its lagoon are dying. This game is for them, and for the Venetians who resist.

name: Speed Factor
description: An old-school racing game featuring 2D pixelated visuals, inspired by 80s and 90s classics, arcade-style gameplay, rock songs and high speed!

name: Monster Hunter Now: Season 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Sugoi Girls: Mighty Mecha
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Arcade Archives: vs. Battle City
description:
Take down the enemy tank corps and hold your HQ
to the end!

name: Bodycam Police Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Gridlink
description: Gridlink is a fun, minimalist puzzle game with a simple premise - connect the numbers on a square grid with a single, continuous line that traverses all squares and does not cross itself.

name: Rabbit in the Clouds
description: A small game where you control a rabbit escaping from the darkness that is chasing him. You need to jump on clouds to progress and use soap bubbles to jump even higher. During the game, you can encounter several types of power-up bonuses to gain a temporary advantage.

name: Gunfire Reborn: Realm of Frost and Inkwash
description: The Realm of Frost and Inkwash is arrivingBrush and ink swing, frost chills the scene. Two new heroes Momo and Lyn are waiting to depart on a journey with you! Before the journey begins, Momo wields the calligraphy brush and brings us four unique and fantasy weapons from the painting world.

name: Back to Base(Q2)ics Jam 1
description: The Back to Base(Q2)ics Jam 1 Mission Pack contains 16 brand new maps, each with their own story intermission and offering hours of gameplay. There is also an expansive hub map containing a secret level and a boss map, bringing the grand total to 18.

name: The Trouble: Defense
description: This is an ordinary tower defense game. If you are not satisfied with the existing content, you can leave a message in the comment area or our QQ group. We will try our best to make this game better.

name: Colorful Life Simulator
description: Colorful Life Simulator is a life simulator that combines text and dynamic comics. In it, you can experience carefully arranged different lives by choosing different paths, from birth to old age, from construction sites to celebrities, and experience a complete and exciting random life!

name: Maimai DX Prism
description: The sixth release of SEGA's arcade rhythm game, maimai DX.

name: Just 1 Minute! Memory Test with Masterpieces
description:
Which Hand Was on Top in the Mona Lisa’s Lap?
Test Your Memory with Famous Paintings in Just One Minute!

name: Spot the Difference: Ukiyo-e Thirty-six Views of Mt. Fuji
description:
Find mistakes in Thirty-six Views of Mt. Fuji!
Enjoy brain training while looking at Ukiyo-e!

name: Brain Training!! Hiragana ＆ Katakana Search
description:
Find the indicated letters among many letters!
This is a brain training game to train your quick thinking skills!

name: Eggconsole Dragon Slayer: The Legend of Heroes PC-8801mkIISR
description: Falcom's Dragon Slayer VI is the series' first command-type RPG! As Prince Selios of the Farlane Kingdom, defeat the evil Akdam!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: The Willow Man
description: Beware The Willow Man as he lurks throughout the halls, in your dreams, and into your soul. Can you survive the night in this horror adventure.

name: Alian Planet
description: Sci-fi horror action ADV fighting aliens on an unknown planet!

name: Cardcaptor Sakura: Memory Key
description:
The official licensed anime adaptation of "Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card" invites you to embark on an adorable journey to collect little Sakura's treasures.

Chibi 3D Sakura is here with cuteness overload, experience the joy of collecting mystery boxes right on your mobile device!

name: Taboo Trial: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Make it! Crepe
description:
It's time for a delicious crepe-making challenge!
Make as many as you can and watch your food cart prosper!

name: Boys Race
description: You will have a long and difficult road to victory. You know it's better not to go it alone, right? Get your Boys together and get to the finish! Not everyone will make it, but those who do will help the others reach the finish line. It's a team effort and a team victory.

name: Metro Quester: Osaka
description:
METRO QUESTER | OSAKA is a dungeon exploration RPG based in a post-apocalyptic futuristic world created by the manga artist Kazushi Hagiwara, with a deep game system designed by Hironori Kato that offers the excitement and surprises reminiscent of 1980s computer games through hack and slash.

Moving the location to the city of water, Osaka, it features 32 characters and 8 classes, enjoyable combo skills, numerous customizable weapons, a bestiary, and features like NEW GAME+ for replayability, offering plenty of depth for dedicated gamers.

name: Hidden Cats: Zoo
description: Dive into the enchanting world of "Hidden Cats - Zoo" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: 10-Second Ghost
description: A creative indie game from GameJam. Your past self will turn into a ghost and help your current self solve the puzzle together.

name: Nightingale: Realms Rebuilt
description: Sin descripción

name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Isekai Chronicles - DLC 2
description: Sin descripción

name: The Rookery
description: All the strategic depth of chess with all the fun of roguelikes! Upgrade your army with boosts, relics, and consumables to take on formidable bosses - without all the tools at your disposal, you won't stand a chance!

name: Head to Hell
description: You wake up on a running train, everything is unfamiliar, except for a text giving you clues and guiding you to take steps. The answers might be found from every detail.

name: Shadow Trick
description: Turn into a shadow and clear all the levels. Shadow Trick is a cute platformer game starring a wizard able to switch between the real world and the shadow realm. Keep an eye on your shadow and don't let your eyes trick you!

name: Marvel vs. Capcom Fighting Collection: Arcade Classics
description:
Dive into an action-packed lineup consisting of seven unique titles, including heavy hitters like X-MEN VS. STREET FIGHTER, and MARVEL vs. CAPCOM 2 New Age of Heroes. The collection also includes the rare beat 'em up game, THE PUNISHER.

Whether you're new to the series or a nostalgic arcade veteran, players of all skill levels can enjoy these timeless classics together through local and online play!

name: OneKind
description: Three bad friends on a farm... Fast or slow, brave or master of hiding, everyone is the enemy... However, the only owner of the farm... Remember, the most reliable defence is hiding... This game invites you into an exciting world, whether you are a hunt, a huntsman or a spy!

name: Dice Player One
description: "Dice Player One" is a roguelike strategy game where dice reign supreme! Roll your dice, seize pivotal moments, and transform limited chances into boundless opportunities. Conquer challenges, unearth hidden secrets, and master the art of dice manipulation!

name: Drill Core
description: Corporate greed meets strategic planet-mining in Drill Core! Drill to the heart of planets while managing workers, researching cutting-edge tech, and fortifying against alien attacks. Will you prioritize efficiency and risk your workers' safety, or focus on defense for survival?

name: Celestia: Chain of Fate
description: A romance-fantasy visual novel that delivers a captivating player driven narrative. Enrol at Celestia Academy and uncover your heritage. Delve into a fantastical realm and unearth your magical potential as a hybrid. Forge new friendships and build affections based on your love interests.

name: The Jackbox Naughty Pack
description: Bring the heat with a threesome of fun in Jackbox Naughty Pack. Find out who’s the best liar in Fakin’ It All Night Long, illustrate spicy prompts in Dirty Drawful, and answer questions like “How does this avocado get aroused?” in Let Me Finish.

name: Hentai Puppy Maid
description: Hentai Puppy Maid is an Hentai Visual Novel for adults where your maid on duty will do her best to fullfill your needs, specially the sexual ones!. Become a good master for your maid and make sure to reward her hard work!

name: Early Mellow
description: A short walking sim game where after a car crash you wander into strange lands. Chop some cactus and turn an old mill into a concert hall. That's your life now.

name: Art-Therapy: Cross Stitch
description: Perfect for all ages, Art-Therapy: Cross Stitch offers a serene escape from the hustle and bustle of daily life. Whether you're a seasoned stitcher or a newcomer to the craft, our intuitive gameplay makes it easy to dive in and start creating your own masterpiece.

name: DeathSprint 66
description: DEATHSPRINT 66 redefines hardcore arcade racing, fusing high-speed on-foot racing with a dystopian setting and deadly obstacles. Unleash your velocity, push limits, and claim glory like never before.

name: Help the Cats
description: Here are some cute hand-drawn cats that need your help. You can help by finding hidden things around you. Guess the cats' clues to lift the tablecloth, search through the mouse hole, and open the door. If you open the tomb incorrectly, you may be in for a surprise!

name: The Hokkaido Serial Murder Case: The Okhotsk Disappearance - Memories in Ice, Tearful Figurine
description:
The legendary Okhotsk Disappearance... is coming back.

A Nipopo doll sheds a tear—another soul is sheds its mortal coil.
One morning, a man's body is found floating in the Tokyo bay.
He's estimated to be in his forties.
But the incident doesn't stop here. It moves to Hokkaido's cities: Kushiro, Abashiri, Shiretoko, Monbetsu...
A second and third murder link the northern island to Tokyo.

The Okhotsk Disappearance is a graphic adventure game where you play as a police detective.
Your job is to find the truth behind the serial murders with the help of your subordinates.
To do so, you have a command interface with 14 actions, such as "Change Location" and "Ask someone".

name: Mannequin
description:
Mannequin is an up to 2v3 asymmetrical VR multiplayer game. Two elite Agents ruthlessly hunt an opposing side of three shape-shifting aliens known as Mannequins. Aliens hide in plain sight, blending in by posing as frozen human statues. They ambush unsuspecting Agents, dashing forward and freezing them in place with a single touch.

Agents use bleeding edge tech to hunt Mannequins, scanning for targets with their EMF Readers and taking them down with an EMP gun. It’s their job to decipher friend from foe. If they make the wrong decision, they’re exposed.

The last team standing wins in this tense, frantic game of cat and mouse.

name: Intoxicated Driver
description: Drink and drive the safe way, behind a computer with your friends. Compete against your friends in various drinking and driving related game modes!

name: Fears to Fathom: Woodbury Getaway
description: In the fifth episode of Fears to Fathom you play as Sydney Harper, a 23-year-old working at a consulting firm plans a weekend getaway to a rental in Woodbury with her college friends. Little did they know what was about to unfold during their stay. Sydney survived as she made the right choices.

name: NanoApostle
description: NanoApostle is a dark sci-fi boss rush action game featuring intense reaction-based combat and the unique "Destruction Point" system. Play as Anita, a child augmented with lethal nanomachines, as she battles against twisted cybernetic experiments to escape a top-secret facility.

name: Wild Bastards
description: The spiritual successor to the epic strategy-shooter Void Bastards, Wild Bastards is a hybrid FPS/strategy game with heart-pounding tactical combat, detailed management systems, and a roguelike campaign. Saddle up and lead the most notorious outlaws in the galaxy.

name: Radiant Victorias
description: With kindom Asira left in ruins, Wolf, the prince of Asira, embarks on a journey around the world where he teams up with eight heroines and tries to stop the empire's ambition.

name: In My Brain
description: In My Brain is a science fiction action video game about Nano, a nanoparticle that enters people's minds to combat their illnesses. Based on real events.

name: Veil of Shadows
description: Veil of Shadows is an action-adventure with roguelite elements, echoing the vibes of classics from the past. Explore the surroundings to understand what's happening to Sirene. With the essence of retro games, face monsters, complete quests to gain experience, and evolve, preparing for the journey.

name: Chernobyl Again
description: Chernobyl Again is an adventure game adjusted for Virtual Reality headsets for a more immersive and engaging experience level. The story full of challenges and turbulence will let the players transform into a character trying to save the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant.

name: Grapple Dogs: Cosmic Canines
description: Swing, jump, and blast through dimensions in this standalone follow-up to the critically-acclaimed 2D action-platformer Grapple Dog. Zip between action-packed worlds as Pablo and Luna team up to save the cosmos in their own unique ways.

name: Sweet Dreams
description: Light hurt his eyes, use that to your advantage and keep him away. Learn the different points where the creature can enter to be prepared. Sound will give you clues to the creature's arrival. Keep your flashlight charged up. Every night the creature will try new ways to trap you.

name: Amedama
description: Side-scrolling, soul-shifting sandbox action adventure brought to life with a striking new 2D style! With only his soul remaining, Yushin must fight tooth and nail, possessing body after body on a quest to find his sister. With just seven days left until his soul departs, can he save her in time?

name: Coryphaeus Championships
description: Coryphaeus Championships is a competitive card game platform that passionately focuses on openly accessible professional play for all. Immerse in endless competitions and become a tournament champion!

name: GoobnBalloonsDX
description: Evil forces have invaded Goobstar! Join Goob and his friends on their quest to save the denizens of planet GoobStar from the invading balloon menace in this wacky hand-drawn Shoot em' up, and watch the world grow around you!

name: AirBorne Sea
description: You find yourself stationed behind the awesome firepower of a 40mm anti-aircraft fixed deck gun on the bow of a battleship. Your mission is to blast away at the endless onslaught of enemy attackers bent on sinking your battleship.

name: Hollowbody
description:
A tech-noir survival horror short story, set in the urban decay of a long abandoned British city.

It's a Shipper's biggest fear. You're grounded in the exclusion zone, twenty miles of death and decay sealed off by the towering, suffocating walls erected after the collapse.

Play as Mica, an unlicensed black market shipper who will stop at nothing to find her missing partner.

Alone, stranded, and with limited resources at your disposal you'll have to push your way through the zone, solve environmental puzzles, manage resources and fight for your life as you try to find a way to escape beyond the wall.

name: Reka
description: Start your life as an apprentice witch to the legendary Baba Jaga and venture across a mysterious, natural landscape with your companion, chicken-legged cottage. Develop your magical powers, customise your home, craft potions, help or hinder villagers find your way in the world.

name: Lollipop Chainsaw RePop
description: Lollipop Chainsaw RePop is a remaster of the original. RePOP is a definitive version of the game which leaves the story unchanged, with the focus on quality of life improvements and additional gameplay content.

name: Melobot: A Last Song
description: Immerse yourself in the dreamlike world of Melobot - A Last Song, an adventure, action, and rhythm game that thrusts you into a heroic quest to save a planet plagued by a strange disease. You play as Melobot, a lovable musical robot originally designed for peace, and awaken to a vital mission: revive the planet’s unique flora by recreating their songs and overcoming the challenges set by powerful guardians.

name: Fealty
description: A tactical, turn-based, strategy game you can play alone or with friends in about an hour or two! Simple to play, yet tough to master. Plan your strategy, conquer your foes, or help your liege win the crown on a procedurally generated island kingdom. Claim the throne... or bend the knee!

name: Chef RPG
description: Craft your culinary adventure in a beautiful pixel art world. Manage your restaurants, forage and hunt for ingredients, befriend locals, and grow your culinary empire. What kind of chef will you be?

name: Turbo Sliders Unlimited
description: Turbo Sliders Unlimited is a spiritual successor of many classic top-down racing games, but in 3D and with modern online features and extensive customization and modding possibilities. It goes far beyond being just a racing game - it is a community driven platform where anyone can create their own levels, vehicles and game modes. It can be played as a serious esports game or as a fun casual game. It can be played alone, as online multiplayer or as local multiplayer.

name: Garden Witch Life
description: Journey through various distant and isolated skies, making and helping friends along the way. Sharing company with those who have stories to tell and new perspectives to discover.

name: Stardiver
description:
Stardiver is a sci-fi, single-player, action-adventure game where you pilot a ship, fight enemies, and slay Bosses. The game takes place entirely underwater.

Stardiver will take you to an unknown world in which you’ll experience exciting fights, and discover new species and places. And you’ll take care of resources supply, crafting items in your base, and developing your own ship.

name: Caravan SandWitch
description: Embark on a journey across vast landscapes in Caravan SandWitch, a captivating narrative-driven exploration adventure game.

name: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown
description: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown is an open world driving and lifestyle experience. Grab your keys and live your life of luxury. Remember, social status is everything In the world of Test Drive Unlimited.

name: RP7: Spin Your Own Encounter
description: RP7 is a slot-managing roguelike. Instead of character control, you can roll seven random encounter slots to create your character's journey. Roll and re-roll each step of your journey as you plan ahead. With one simple mechanic, you'll experience infinite RPG gameplay. Fight monsters, gather golds, be more strong, and find your missing pet frog!

name: Evotinction
description: Evotinction is a third-person stealth game featuring unique hacking mechanics. The developers share an enormous passion for the stealth genre and wish to provide a complex and dynamic stealth experience for players. A variety of hacking skills, environment devices and gadgets provide rich emergent gameplay.

name: Downfall
description:
In the midst of those terrible nightmares that keep you up at night, you leap into the abyss to restore the life destroyed by your dealings with the devil.

Faust, the protagonist, had a successful life due to his dealings with the devil, but now he suffers from terrible dreams each night. To find what lies at the end of those dreams—to end it all—he decides to plunge into those nightmares and face the monsters that lie within...

Downfall is a roguelike hack-and-slash game where you develop your character by stylishly defeating the endless waves of enemies within your nightmare.

name: EFootball: Neymar Jr Edition 2025
description:
Get your hands on Neymar Jr, the unrivalled superstar.
Introducing the special edition of eFootball. No better time to start playing eFootball than now!

name: EFootball: Neymar Jr Edition 2025 - Deluxe
description:
Get your hands on Neymar Jr, the unrivalled superstar.
Introducing the special edition of eFootball. No better time to start playing eFootball than now!

name: EFootball: Leo Messi Edition 2025
description:
Bolster your team with Lionel Messi, the living legend.
Introducing the special edition of eFootball. No better time to start playing eFootball than now!

name: EFootball: Leo Messi Edition 2025 - Deluxe
description:
Bolster your team with Lionel Messi, the living legend.
Introducing the special edition of eFootball. No better time to start playing eFootball than now!

name: Escape Enthusiast
description: Sin descripción

name: AAA Clock: Extreme Magnificent Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Doll Catching Simulator
description: In the busy life, do you long to experience the fun of catching dolls but are limited by time and space? Now, the doll catching simulator brings you a brand-new entertainment experience!

name: IF: Imaginary Friends
description: The main character, a young boy named Croqui, is reunited with the imaginary friends he created in his infancy due to a mental regression caused by the birth of his younger sister. Fearing that he will be forgotten again, the friends try to trap him in their imaginary world by playing games with him! You are Croqui and you will win the game with your friends. An adventure game with an atmosphere like a picture book or a painting, featuring unique imaginary friends.

name: Meow Hunter
description:
Meow Hunter is a pixel side-scrolling action RPG featuring adorable cat characters. It combines classic roguelike elements with the exhilarating combat experiences of platformer games.

In this meow-velous universe, you'll become a bounty hunter taking on missions across various planets in a space adventure to find energy and resources. Every hunt offers a fresh experience with a touch of retro arcade fun. Ready for it? The battle is set to unfold!

name: Raide
description: Sin descripción

name: On Sunday 2
description:
A narrative-based action game with adventure elements.

- Oppose the whimsical bosses by finding out how to pass by them
- Stay unharmed with all those different enemies
- Limited Praying power only available on some levels
- Press X to change the situation with the Prayer
- Pass through the mini story of passions and ire boiling in one tiny soul

name: Nagaisan
description: I came to know "her." Since then, I've felt someone's gaze from somewhere. Memories of the place I reached while searching for a lost dog in the past. I'm not sure if it's connected, but I did something. "NAGAISAN" is an adventure game based on urban legends.

name: CalorieMate Liquid for Game Creators
description: Transform into a can of Calorie Mate LIQUID that jumps out of the fridge and deliver nutrition to a game creator hard at work. This action-adventure takes you on a journey through an apartment room.

name: Zoul Dungeon
description: is a strategic dungeon defense game where you take on the role of a dungeon master. Summon monsters, upgrade your lair, and set traps to fend off waves of greedy adventurers. Protect your treasures and prove your worth as the ultimate dungeon overlord!

name: ClickCatToe
description:
Cat Clicker

Welcome to Cat Clicker! This addictive and fun game tests your reflexes and clicking skills. The goal is simple: click on the cat to collect points and activate bonuses. Featuring a retro 8-bit design and vibrant music, Cat Clicker offers a casual gaming experience perfect for all audiences.

name: Eggs: All Guns Broken
description: Warning: This game starts 6 minutes long but can go on forever. Eggs is a slow-paced casual rail shooter that places you in a desert loop to face endless variations of baddies. Fly as far as you can!

name: X Roulette
description: Roulette is a 3D Horror-Adult game that revolves around the chilling ritual of taking turns firing a shotgun.

name: Star-Wired
description: Repair the circuitry of your Starship and clear out the intrusive programs in a cute and casual puzzle game. Plug in cables, activate moving objects, and dodge malicious entities on your quest for success!

name: Tiles Puzzle
description: A simple and difficult puzzle game where you have to turn all the squares purple.

name: The Adventure of Popo
description: Join the adorable polar bear Popo on his adventure! Use shakes strategically to evade enemies and collect hints to overcome obstacles. Will Popo safely reach the polar bear village?

name: Corn
description: Corn — the interactive clicker featuring America's favorite fruit, brought to you by the developer of Cuckold Simulator. Buy corn, collect corn, trade corn. We love corn!

name: Slime Musume ha Ningen to Tomodachi ni Naritai you da
description: “Hello, humans! Will you be my friend?” This is a point-and-click novel game about Aura, a slime girl who wants to become friends with humans. Aura is pure and innocent, and easily influenced by the emotions of the humans she meets...

name: Grappling Hook and Grappling Hook
description: This is a physics based VR game about grappling hook. Use your two grappling guns to attach to walls using special ropes. Not only can you swing, but also pull forward, allowing some complex maneuver between buildings within 3D space. Join Discrod or QQ 278367233 group!

name: Hentai Violet
description: Violet is a nasty girl Will you be able to handle her?

name: Yez: The Dark Amulet
description: Yez has been infected with an element called Startite It spread through the land and twisted it's creatures into the Shadow Beings. The Creator sent down a Universal Guardian to deal the Shadow Beings. But after thousands of years of peace. The Shadow Beings have returned. Now it's all up to you.

name: Tyrannical Chickens
description: Chickens have started a despotic uprising in this 2D shooter, and you are tasked with putitng it down. Buy guns, upgrade them, kill chickens - and die. Over. And over. And over.

name: Fighting for Singleship: I am Chased by a Bunch of Women But I Just Want to Play Video Games
description: You relish indoor life, gaming, but now, a challenging twist: every woman adores you. Witness the story unfold. Conquer challenging waves of unhinged admirers, aiming to remain unmarried. Climb the leaderboard against your friends, proving your supremacy.

name: Future Breach: Youngblood
description: Future Breach: Youngblood is a prologue chapter of the main game, Future Breach 3D. Breach and Clear areas tactically in a team-based shooter.

name: Cardboard Fish
description: Dive into the captivating world of Cardboard Fish! Experience gripping gameplay as Nozzle, the heroic fish, in a physics-based adventure filled with skill challenges and mind-bending puzzles for thrilling progress and achievement.

name: Roborne
description: Explore and escape the sci-fi robot factory, classified as NR Securities. Are you willing to unveil the secrets of this twisted and corrupted factory?

name: Line Time
description: 《Line Time》is a puzzle game based on “controlling the timeline”.

name: ExoColony: Planet Survival
description: Space-colony simulation game where you have to survive on an unknown planet with your wrecked spaceship. Start a new civilization and terraform the planet. Expand your colony, mine resources, refine them and build a thriving place to survive.

name: Demolish & Build 3
description: In Demolish & Build 3 you play as the owner of a demolition company. Accept contracts and complete them yourself or delegate them to your workers. Use powerful equipment, from sledgehammers to giant cranes. Manage your company by hiring workers and buying new vehicles and properties.

name: Paws for Adventure
description: Hunt, Fight and Meow your way to saving the cat colonies. A purrrfect adventure for cat lovers.

name: FaeVerse Alchemy
description: What wonders await those brave enough to follow the alchemical path of magic? FaeVerse Alchemy is a puzzle game where you combine like elements to form greater elements in an effort to create the most powerful elements of all and get the highest score possible.

name: War Thunder: AV-8B Night Attack Bundle
War Thunder: Al-Khalid-I Bundle
Wash Simulator: Clean Garage, House, Cars Business Tycoons - Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Uzzuzzu My Pet: Golf Dash - Amazing Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Crimson Chaos
description: Choose your path, make critical decisions, and find love amidst the chaos. Will you unravel the mysteries of the night or fall prey to the shadows?

name: VolleySmash
description: Fast-paced 3D volleyball game, perfect for casual gamers, competitive players, and volleyball fans

name: Frizzle
description: Unravel the dark secret within Frizzle, a small but captivating virtual pet game for the Panic Playdate. While the pixelated world promises warmth and companionship, an unsettling undercurrent simmers beneath the surface. As you nurture your digital friend, a struggle for dominance unfolds, forcing you to question everything you thought you knew.

name: Observation at Freddy's
description: Observation Duty meets Five Nights at Freddy's 1 with new mechanics and a revamped story! Fend off the animatronics while searching the cameras for anything out of place.

name: Steel Legion
description: Steel Legion is a NES homebrew metroidvania 2D platformer set in a cyberpunk universe where you play as a cyborg commando. Explore an interconnected world, find secrets and abilities, meet NPCs and battle bosses in order to destroy a dangerous A.I.

name: Idle Saga
description: Sin descripción

name: Garbage Scow Captain
description: Until recently you were an elite Star Fighter Pilot. On your last mission, everything that could go wrong did go wrong.

name: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Season Pass 2024
description: Sin descripción

name: Raptor Rampage: Dino Hunter
description: Sin descripción

name: Digdig
description: A casual game where you turn a crank and dig the ground more and more!

name: First Strike Still Deadly
description: A set of 3 Limit Removing Levels for Doom 2.

name: UNO: Legacy Edition
description: Dive into the world of UNO with the Legacy Edition bundle, featuring the classic card game alongside three exciting DLCs: UNO Flip!, UNO 50th Anniversary, and UNO Party! Mania. Inspired by Mattel's iconic physical games, each DLC adds a unique twist on the beloved gameplay experience, ensuring endless hours of fun!

name: Backrooms Media
description: Backrooms Media is a multiplayer co-op exploration game that plunges you into unsettling, hyper-realistic liminal spaces. Navigate eerie environments filled with lurking horrors. Group up with your friends to face the terror of the endless backrooms together and... try to escape.

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Flying Aureus Shot to Lupine Rue
description:
Version 2.5 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Feixiao, Lingsha, and Moze
• New Trailblaze Continuance: Finest Duel Under the Pristine Blue (Part 2)
• New area: The Skysplitter
• …and more!

name: Forza Horizon 5: 1969 Chevrolet Camaro Jordan Luka 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Satisfactory: 1.0 Update
description:
The 1.0 release of Satisfactory, a 3D co-op factory building game.

1.0 will contain many new features, including story content, and the addition of tier 9 and phase 5.

name: Oh My Lord
description: Manage your medieval fantasy city, balance resources, and navigate the demands of different factions. Unlock new characters to join your city and help maintain order.

name: Mini Lax Sim 24
description: Small But Powerful Lacrosse Simulator + Auto-Battler Game. Draft your team, upgrade your players, set your strategies and win the championship!

name: Mojito the Cat: Halloween Skins
description: Expand your cube-shaped friend collection with this 4 new halloween based skins

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Reckoning of New York
description: Vampire: The Masquerade - Reckoning of New York is a narrative game set in the World of Darkness Universe. Play as one of the members of the Vampire Clans in a shifting political landscape between the Camarilla and the Anarchs while trying your best to survive.

name: I Am Your Beast
description: I Am Your Beast is a shortform covert revenge thriller FPS about getting hunted across the North American wilderness by the military-industrial complex--and turning the tables.

name: Captive: You Are My Idol
description: A young adult, Aylen, is an online personality who loves horror games. As she was shooting the intro for her next Let's Play, her biggest fan kidnaps her. There are only two means for escape: examine the area and begin plotting, or try your charisma and get an edge over him.

name: Yars Rising
description:
From the renowned development studio WayForward Technologies, Inc. (Shantae, River City Girls, Advance Wars 1+2: Re-Boot Camp) comes Yars Rising, a 2D action adventure exploration of one of Atari’s richest, and best known classic titles.

In WayForward’s experienced hands, the Yars franchise becomes an expansive mystery solved through 2D platforming action. Take control of the young hacker Emi Kimura, who is hired by a mysterious patron to infiltrate the shadowy QoTech corporation. Run, jump, sneak, and hack your way through challenges as you slowly unravel a complex secret shrouded in intrigue.

name: Trap Tower Trials
description: Trap Tower Trials is a 3D single-player platformer that will test your dexterity with various traps and obstacles. This game is designed to be a challenge; therefore, we are not responsible for any peripherals broken in anger. Do you think you'll be able to climb the tower?

name: Stellaris: Cosmic Storms
description: A new phenomenon has been observed around the Galaxy - storms are sweeping through system. Prepare your Empire and brace to face this new upcoming threat, and leverage possibilities that open when your opponents are weakened by it.

name: Pushing It! With Sisyphus
description: A game about a very happy guy and his boulder.

name: Manika
description: "Manika" is a psychological horror game played in the first-person perspective. Solve puzzles to escape from a mental hospital where you don't know why you are there and try to regain your memories. Good luck, because you are not alone...

name: Persona 3 Reload: Episode Aigis
description:
After unravelling the mysteries of the Dark Hour, fighting epic battles through Tartarus, and all the unforgettable events of Persona 3 Reload, the S.E.E.S. members find themselves trapped in a never-ending March 31st.

When an unfamiliar android, Metis, suddenly appears at the dorm along with the mysterious "Abyss of Time", the team works together to uncover the cause of this strange fate..

name: Tranquil Builds
description: Construct an oasis of relaxing places, beautiful architecture and naturescapes. No time pressure. No scoring. No way to fail. Just relax and unwind.

name: Devil's Hideout
description: Devil's Hideout is a horror point and click adventure. Lauren learns from a mystic that her young sister is still alive, with cultists staging her death. Traveling to the hospital where her sister received care, Lauren plunges headfirst into a nightmare.

name: Escape Party
description: Embark on 3D online multiplayer escape rooms in Escape Party. Solve puzzles, test your speed, and conquer challenges together.

name: Last Dream Fishing Arcade
description: Fish your way across lush Gaia in this retro 2D pixel-art fishing RPG. Enjoy a relaxing day or battle for your fishing life against monsters of the deep. With 12 selectable characters, varying difficulty, equipment options, and numerous surprises, you’ll be hooked on this buried treasure of a game!

name: Inari
description: A love simulation game set in a beautiful beach town. Make various stories with women of different charms.

name: Arcane Blast
description: Arcane Blast is a fast-paced, action-packed roguelike brimming with sorcery. Master the seven elements, combine them to achieve powerful reactions and face swarms of enemies to help feline Mage Adrian find his way home from a time dungeon.

name: The Elder Scrolls: Castles
description:
From Bethesda Game Studios, the award-winning developer behind The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim and Fallout Shelter, comes The Elder Scrolls: Castles—a new mobile game that puts you in control of your very own castle and dynasty. Oversee your subjects as the years come and go, families grow, and new rulers take the throne.

Build Your Dynasty – Tell your story for generations—each day in real life covers the span of an entire year in The Elder Scrolls: Castles. Train your subjects, name heirs, and maintain order to help your kingdom flourish. Will you keep your subjects happy and ensure a long life for their ruler? Or will they grow discontent and plot assassination?

Manage Your Castle – Customize your castle from the ground up, adding and expanding rooms, placing lavish decorations and inspirational monuments, and even assign subjects to workstations to ensure your castle has the resources to thrive for years to come!

Rule Your Kingdom – Make key decisions that impact your legacy. Will you risk a limited supply of food to aid a neighboring kingdom? How should a heated spat between your subjects be settled? Your choices determine if your rule will inspire prosperity or lead your castle to peril.

Complete Epic Quests – Create heroes, equip them with epic gear, and send them to battle against classic Elder Scrolls foes to collect valuable items and keep your kingdom growing.

name: Hive Jump 2: Survivors
description: Become an agent of vengeance in this bullet-heaven action roguelite! You are the lone survivor of your squad, on an alien planet with just your weapon, a jetpack, and the courage to keep fighting. Kill off alien swarms and transform their valuable guts into explosive upgrades and vital utilities.

name: Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland
description: A baby-fresh take on retro-inspired gameplay, featuring a unique co-op design, where kids and parents need to stick together to win!

name: Lindwyrm
description: Lindwyrm combines hack‘n‘slay combat, platforming, puzzling and housing in the shell of a rogue-lite action RPG. Crawl into thrilling dungeons, slay epic bosses with your weapon of choice, enhance your hero, and rebuild a destroyed village in this co-op adventure.

name: Eon Trooper
description: Lead an elite squad on a hostile alien planet! Recruit and command up to 4 NPC soldiers with unique powers to complete missions and overcome waves of enemies. Level up and dominate the battlefield with strategy and teamwork. Get ready for action!

name: Towerborne
description: The Belfry stands as a beacon of hope and safety amongst the ruins of humanity and the City of Numbers, with monsters lurking right outside the tower’s walls. You are an Ace, born anew from the spirit realm with the skills, the grit, and the determination to protect the people of the Belfry.

name: Courier Tale
description: You've joined the gig economy as a courier for T.A.L.E. Couriers! Explore, meet and chat with a cast of characters, complete deliveries for the company while doing jobs on the side in this pixel art adventure where this job is not everything you expected it to be...

name: Critter Cove
description: You have been hired by the citizens of Critter Cove to help put their town on the map. Use your trusty salvage vessel and elite diving skills to find the resources needed from the ruins of an ancient civilization sunk beneath the wave and turn Critter Cove into a prosperous port town.

name: Elsie
description: Elsie is an indie action-platformer filled with rogue-like mechanics such as perma-death, procedurally generated levels, and a wide scope of items and weaponry to make each run as unique as possible.

name: Satisfactory
description: Satisfactory is an FPS open-world factory building sim. You play as an engineer on an alien planet tasked to complete ‘Project Assembly’ - a massive machine for a mysterious purpose. Conquer nature, build multi-story factories, and automate to satisfaction!

name: Soko Banana
description: "Soko Banana" is a puzzle game developed for the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES), inspired by the classic Sokoban concept. Players guide the young monkey, Skid, through banana warehouses across five distinct islands, each introducing unique mechanics such as pits, breakable blocks, and teleporters. The objective is to maneuver banana crates to designated exits while collecting bananas to unlock bonus levels. The game offers 55 levels in total, including hidden secrets.

name: World of Warships: Legends - Iron Will
description: Show your iron will in combat—equip yourself with Soviet Tier II Premium cruiser Varyag, camouflages, Boosters, and Premium days!

name: World of Warships: Legends - Eagle Union's Power
description: Get unique content from the Azur Lane universe: U.S. cruiser AL Baltimore and her Commander—with 80% off!

name: It Takes Two to Tangle
description: It Takes Two to Tangle is a 2024 King's Quest fan game release. It is an unofficial follow-up to King's Quest VIII and continues the story of Queen Cassima, wife of King Alexander and Prince Edgar, lover of Princess Rosella on a long, perplexing journey which will ultimately decide the fate of both themselves and their loved ones.

name: Fire Emblem: The Morrow’s Golden Country
description:
Ulmaron. A world of constant change. Of mystical researchers. Of fierce warriors. Of fallen kings. Of undying darkness.

A young noble, seeking to prove herself. Her path will place her at the center of a conflict that may very well decide the future of the continent.

name: Last Call
description:
Pale Moon City is cursed, or so they say. Ghosts, demons, angels, cults, if you've seen it in a horror movie, someone has seen it in Pale Moon City. It's a city that loves horror, and horror loves Pale Moon right back.

Tonight is but one example of the odd things that can happen in this weird city. Last Call is the story of two men who meet at a bar during the night of a new moon, and a little girl who wants to play hide and seek.

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Ultra Complete
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Girls: Ultra Definitive
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic the Hedgehog Legacy Bundle
description:
Well, the day has come. As promised, Sonic Generations has officially been delisted from Steam. If you were one of those who due to whatever reason didn't get the game in time, don't fret just yet! Because as also promised, a new "legacy bundle" has just been released onto both Steam and Xbox (without any formal announcement, oddly enough) that includes the original Sonic Generations plus its Casino Night DLC. As for what else is included, take a gander below:

Sonic Adventure + DX DLC
Sonic Adventure 2 + Battle DLC
Sonic the Hedgehog 4: Episode 1
Sonic the Hedgehog 4: Episode 2
Sonic 3D Blast (Steam Only)
Sonic Spinball (Steam Only)
Sonic the Fighters (Xbox Only)

name: J8 Princess Rhapsody
description: Chinese love simulation, with different styles of female masters began a fantasy journey, and in the process of contact with them in-depth understanding.

name: Is It Woke?
description: Is It Woke? is a browser game where one has to guess wither or not a video game is considered "woke" or not based upon a spreadsheet created by the Steam group Woke Content Detector. The player gets a point every single question in a they get right, however if they get one wrong, they lose a point.

name: Roll'N With Da Punchez
description:
"Roll'N With Da Punchez" is a stylistic, physics-based platformer with a unique twist! Punch a ball through challenging obstacle courses, and reach the goal as fast as possible!

But stay alert of your surroundings, as one wrong move could send the ball plummeting back down!

Don't let that get you down though! Roll With The Punches and Try Again!

name: Floor 9
description: In Floor 9, you find yourself trapped in a mysterious hotel known as "Hotel Liminal." To escape, you must identify anomalies on each floor. These anomalies can be anywhere - on the ground, in paintings, or even right in front of your eyes. You must check every corner carefully, as one mistake will send you back to the beginning, to Floor 9. The game offers you a unique blend of eerie atmosphere, puzzle-solving, and survival, all wrapped up in a psychologically thrilling experience.

name: D4p4m1ne
description: D4P4M1NE is a clicker game, in which you click a colorful button! In D4P4M1NE you click the colorful button to gain the "feel-good" hormone!

name: Radical Problems
