description: A Half-Life 1 Modification where you play as a Scientist in Area 9 Hazardous Waste Facilities.

name: Cactiverse
description: The world of Cactiverse, where gardening meets dragon-fueled fun! Grow your cacti, unleash fireballs, and join a vibrant community on Discord. With weekly tournaments and hilarious gameplay, Cactiverse is your next obsession. Fun, challenging, and social—what more could you ask for?

name: Forza Motorsport: 1969 Chevrolet Camaro Jordan Luka 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Destroy All Letters
description: Destroy All Letters is a challenging game where you practice typing. Each time you type, your goal is to hit and destroy as many letters as possible without looking at the keyboard. Improve your typing skills by solving speed and accuracy challenges to achieve the best result.

name: Hard Time III
description: The toughest prison sim in the yard is back to serve its 3rd consecutive sentence - combining classic moments from the OG with the best aspects of 2D, while putting out a few hits of its own! Tackle crime from either side of the prison fence, while a larger world beyond it makes life worth living.

name: Cam
description: CAM is a fps that has PvP action and a cooperative zombie survival mode, featuring a body camera perspective and realistic graphics. Wishlist and share CAM with friends! Send us proof of wishlist to apply for a exclusive beta access and to test upcoming updates!

name: Skeletal Skism 2
description: War rages on between the undead... All for one sole purpose: to determine the ONE - TRUE - SKELETON - KING. Do you have what it takes to claim the crown?

name: Cosmic Cowboy
description: Cosmic Cowboy is a tactic turn-based RPG inspired by the original Fallout, Borderlands and XCOM, where the player must navigate the distant planet of Armstrong and its dangerous inhabitants in this character-driven Space Western narrative.

name: Utopia Must Fall
description: Defend humanity's last metropolis from mysterious alien machinations in this base-defending arcade shooter. Featuring rapid progression, randomly generated attack patterns and laser-sharp retro aesthetics.

name: Star Fetchers: Escape from Pork Belly
description: A action filled rouglite boxing game where you'll punch and claw yourself out of the fighting ring "Pork Belly", an illegal gladiator arena hidden in the outskirt of the Gray Zone.

name: The Adventures of Emoji 4: Fly High Mouse - Remastered
description: Step into The Adventures of Emoji 4 Remastered, where you immerse yourself in this mouse cartoon world playing a shoot em up side-scroller. Follow dynamic rules and use special weapons to defeat enemies for each level. Stay focused on the prize or you might find your game completely cut off.

name: Data Rush: La Course Aux Données
description: Data Rush: The Data Race is an educational 2D adventure video game about the world of DATA. Take control of a customizable avatar and traverse crazy levels packed with original characters and mini-games, to become the master of digital data !

name: Stevedore 2024
description: It's intermodal mayhem! Shift that freight in a hurry without incurring disaster in this physics simulation action RPG. Learn to drive some of the oddest vehicles on the planet as you load huge ocean-crossing ships. And where is that strangely elusive operations manager, the Stevedore?

name: The Dark Horde
description: The Dark Horde is an exciting roguelike deckbuilder where the cost to play cards is TIME. Play your cards to summon a horde of minions and to cast powerful sorceries! Improve your defenses, acquire rare cards, level up, unlock new upgrades and then lay waste to each human settlements!

name: Terrorformer TD
description: Terrorformer TD is a tower defense roguelite where the map erodes and grows as the game progresses -- but the player gets terraforming tools to shape it! Every round, fortify your defenses to survive against waves of enemies; then cash in for new towers, upgrades, and other rewards. Gain XP and level up to unlock new abilities and components after each run and try again to make it even further!

name: Skyward Dream
description: Explore the depths of your mind in Skyward Dream. A first-person platforming adventure set within the interconnected layers of your mind. Navigate surreal dreamscapes, unlock platforming abilities, and confront your inner demons. Can you overcome the challenges of your subconsciousness?

name: A Park Full of Cats: Haunted Ride
description: Prepare to be thrilled and chilled on "A Park Full of Cats: Haunted Ride",' the eerie downloadable content for 'A Park Full of Cats.' Embark on a ghostly adventure through six haunting scenarios! Are you brave enough to face the Haunted Ride?

name: A Park Full of Cats
description: Welcome to 'A Park Full of Cats,' a hidden object game that invites you to revel in the enchanting world of amusement parks! Experience the thrill and excitement of the rides and give those cats the fun they truly deserve!

name: Gravity Lab
description: Change gravity, change life and change the world. Explore the mysterious Gravity Lab, solve puzzles, and find out the truth.

name: Usurper
description: A turn-based roguelike deckbuilder where your King is your strongest weapon. Play cards from your deck to drop units onto the battlefield and checkmate your opponent. Build your Deck, Upgrade your Ruler, and Claim the Throne!

name: Lost in Darkness
description: Lost in Darkness is a 3D top-down horror action game set in the snowy Atlas Mountains of Morocco. Deep in the Moroccan countryside, you are a Royal Gendarmerie motorcyclist who finds himself stranded alone in the woods while investigating the disappearance of a patrol car.

name: Star Knight: Order of the Vortex
description: Star Knight: Order of the Vortex is a rogue-lite, shoot-em-up made to give you fun and interesting decisions and test you skill in action-packed, bullet-hell gameplay. Choose your crew, upgrade your ship, and explore the unknown depths of the Vortex.

name: Ovrlrd
description:
Ovrlrd is a mech combat simulator built from the ground-up for Virtual Reality. Take control of a 50-foot bipedal weapons platform as you carry out complex operations across expansive open maps in a milsim-inspired single-player campaign.

Sit at the controls of a complex war machine, using your virtual hands to manipulate physical buttons, switches, levers, throttles, joysticks and more.

name: Obscura
description: Descend under a mountain to the marketplace below, where everything has a price. Meet the four men who can each give you what you need, but beware: they have their own hidden motives and uses for you. OBSCURA is a dark fantasy romance VN that asks how far you'll go to get what you need.

name: Nightfall Comes
description: Nightfall Comes is a 3D top-view action game with rogue-lite, story of the four protagonists who gathered to the castle of certain land, led by their last lingering feelings in the extinct world.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II
description: The galaxy is in peril. Entire worlds are falling. The Imperium needs you. Embody the superhuman skill and brutality of a Space Marine, the greatest of the Emperor's warriors, with Clive Standen (Vikings, Taken) as the iconic Captain Titus. Unleash deadly abilities and an arsenal of devastating weaponry to obliterate the relentless Tyranid hordes. Hold at bay the horrors of the galaxy in epic battles on far-flung planets. Uncover dark secrets and drive back the everlasting night to prove your ultimate loyalty to humanity.

name: Zero Hour
description: Zero Hour is a tactical FPS with online team-based game play that takes place in a variety of fictional locations interpreted in Bangladesh with Real-life scale & resource management. It brings a grounded, close quarter combat experience to the game.

name: Gay Monopoly
description: A recreation of the 1983 board game Gay Monopoly by The Parker Sister recreated within Tabletop Simulator.

name: The Thirst Road
description: Travel between cities and trade resources in this short desert-themed game. Your goal is to earn 1,000 gold within 30 days.

name: Cynthia: Hidden in the Moonshadow - Summer Edition
description: Emotional, 3rd-person, story-driven, adventure game focused on solving puzzles and using stealth mechanics. Use your bow to interact with environmental elements. Sneak, climb or distract guards to move further unnoticed. Solve light puzzles alongside your path to rescue your loved one.

name: Gokusaishiki Sushi Taisen: Proud Tradition vs. Crazy Imitation
description: Fire your "shari" and deftly deflect their projectiles with "neta"!Utilize these two types of attacks to defeat the ultimate heretical sushi waiting at the deepest level!

name: Ignited Entry
description: Ignited Entry is a full length narrative driven psychological horror game with voice acting, dreamish visuals, and horror elements that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

name: biketerra
description: Biketerra is a web-based indoor cycling app that lets you create and ride any real-world routes.

name: Gold Digger: The Simulator
description: Your Gold Rush Adventure Begins - Build Your Mining Empire.

name: The Three Kingdoms of Destiny
description: The Three Kingdoms of Destiny is a turn-based strategy simulation game, the opening has four different characteristics of the monarch representing 4 countries for players to choose, there are as many as 100 controllable generals, rich transfer system and rich skills of generals,

name: PirateWar
description: piratewar is an fps/tps game. Kill your enemies and win.

name: Graveyard Shift at Freddy's
description:
"Graveyard Shift at Freddy's" is a small Re-Imagining of the original Five Nights at Freddy's, with new twists and turns! Featuring brand new mechanics, visuals, characters, and an entirely new story for you to unravel.

Venture into "Freddybear's Eatery and Fun", watch feeds, and ensure nothing gets damaged.

name: The Discrete Era
description: An Action-Roguelike, multiplayer coop game.

name: Super Company
description: You will act as an entrepreneur in the 1990s, producing all kinds of goods that citizens need; Providing residential and educational services for citizens; Carry out international trade and upgrade industries. You should choose the right development strategy to grow the company.

name: Gravity Escape
description: Gravity Escape is a pixel platform puzzle game. Hero K got the gravity gun by accident and has the ability to control gravity. He need to break through dangerous traps and enemies to find a way back to the from the unknown planet.

name: Moto Racer 2044 Game Simulator: Money Magnet Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Cam Op Simulator
description: Cam Op Simulator allows real world camera operators to learn and practice operating a virtual camera using a gamepad (joystick), Nodo Inertia Wheels, or several supported "Mouse Wheels" like Rexy Wheels, Hammerhead Wheels, Blacktek, and Kino Wheels.

name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas - Flame's Story
description: Flame's Story — a hardcore story mod for GTA: SA with 100 hours of gameplay, where you'll be in the shoes of a man who's always out of money, many debts, but a great appetite for food!

name: An Angel's Final Desire
description:
Play as Emil, who had a fight with his best friend Quinn and they are now missing and he has to find them before it's too late

Can you save Quinn, in the end?

Can you save the child?

name: Pet Kawaii Shop
description: Create the cutest pet paradise and win customers’ hearts!

name: Jump Ball
description: Jump to the top of the towers

name: Bookworm
description: Travel across Wonderland in this zen little typing game.

name: Lovely Lady RPG
description: Lovely Lady RPG is a game about wandering around and just sort of seeing what happens. After waking up with a hole in her ceiling, a cosmic space Orb embedded in her chest and no recollection of basically anything, Ghost sets out to continue her life as best she can.

name: Bleeding Roots
description: Bleeding Roots is a short horror walking simulator taking place throughout the seasons. Water the plants in your garden, learn about them, and grow along them over time. Immerse yourself in a story about loss, grief and obsession. The controls are simple, moving the character through tank controls and reading up on the environment with an interact key.

name: House of Dead Skin
description: Large, abstract and extremely beige single map set in an abstract beige facility built into abstract beige caves. The map is meant to be pretty nonlinear/explorable and large chunks of it are hidden in secrets and/or optional to the non-completionist. Texture theme/visuals and combat setups take a lot from Stardate 20X6 and The 10X10 Project (though it's not quite as hard as those wads.)

name: Spooktober Visual Novel Jam!
description: Help digital mascots Lime, Cherry, Plum and Lemon navigate their way through the Spooktober Visual Novel Jam competition. Laugh, learn, and scream(with excitement, we hope) through this visual novel and make choices to guide the girls to great success or dramatic failure!

name: Crasho Cars
description: In Crasho Cars, race through the desert while evading obstacles and police cars that crash into each other. Collect money and power-ups to survive longer. The goal is simple: stay alive as long as you can in this high-speed, chaotic chase!

name: Ecchi Time: Mia Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Over Tooned
description: A game done in a GenX arcade style with an anime-ish feel

name: Team of Titans
description: The evil Mirror Clan holds dominion over the region of Latos. Everyone has lost all hope, except for one. An unlikely hero must build a Team of Titans and bring an end to the reign of tyranny.

name: Politica: Nothing Ideological. It's Just Business
description: Politica is a mini-game political simulator. Assuming the role of a lobbyist in republican Italy, players will have to accumulate as much money and power as possible through lobbying strategies, political relations and intrigue.

name: Mega Man X8 16-bit
description:
A fan game made by AlyssonDaPaz. Bringing the original PS2 classic, MegaMan X8 back to it's 16-bit roots! Play as X and blast through a familiar yet fresh experience!

Mega Man X8 16-bit is a reimagining of the PS2 original with SNES styled graphics. The aim was to demake X8 in a similar feel to the first three Mega Man X games, while trying to actually finish a low-scope fangame. After two and a half years of development, version 1.0 was released in September 7th 2024, making the game fully playable from start to finish with X, but Zero and Axl are not featured in the game in any capacity.

In addition to the 16-bit graphics, the game differs from the original game by offering slightly different level designs at times, armor effects, and boss weapons.

name: Prophan Escape
description: In Prophan Escape you have to get five coper statues which are in random places around a labirynth to complete each level, it's that simple... Oh, yeah, there are also two antropomorphic weird cubes with realistic extremities that want to kill you, so you will have to avoid that weird guys.

name: Glowpop
description: Beautiful and cute, but so tough it will make you scream. Glowpop is a platformer adventure inspired by Studio Ghibli's art style. And it's difficult. Like really difficult. It will punish you.

name: Stronghold Siege
description: Command your army against a relentless demon horde in this intense real-time strategy game. Master strategy and resource management to conquer the enemy's stronghold while defending your own in the ultimate battle for survival.

name: Park Beyond: Complete Edition
description: Park Beyond is a theme park game that gives you complete freedom to create and manage the parks of your dreams! With thousands of options to detail your dream theme park creation, sharing it with the world, exciting rides to thrill your guests, and powerful tools to track every penny that you earn, there's something for everyone! The Complete Edition includes the base game and the entire contents of the Park Beyond Golden Pass.

name: Outbreak: The Full Monty Collection
description: The definitive ten game Outbreak series collection!

name: Labyrinth of Shadows
description: Dive into the Labyrinth of Shadows, a game that challenges your wits and bravery. Navigate dungeons filled with traps, enemies, and hidden treasures. Use unique artifacts to overcome obstacles and uncover secrets. With procedurally generated levels, each playthrough offers a new adventure.

name: The Smurfs: Colorful Stories - Amazing Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Fit My Zoo: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Bowling Fever: Platinum Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Kalak
description: Discover “Kalak”, the ideal application for those who love challenges! Test your knowledge in geography, literature, history, science, general information and various other categories in a fun and entertaining way. Through the application, you can create your own game with family and friends and add them to your game for the challenge. Suitable for competition lovers and entertainment lovers. “Kalak” is your ideal application for an educational experience. Exciting, download now and start testing your knowledge!

name: Her Apartment
description: "her apartment" is a short retro PSX-style indie horror game

name: Arcane Rush
description: Arcane Rush: Battlegrounds is a digital card game developed by Gear Games. Immerse yourself in epic auto chess card battles, featuring a diverse array of heroes and creatures to collect, upgrade, and lead into battle. Build the ultimate team, summon powerful allies, and engage in strategic duels against players from all corners of the realm. With a unique blend of strategy, creativity, and dynamic gameplay, Arcane Rush delivers a novel experience for auto chess and CCG enjoyers.

name: Croquet Conundrum
description: Croquet Conundrum is a compact puzzle game about hitting a ball through wickets and pipes to explore a world of interconnected islands. A small number of mechanics inspired by the real rules of croquet combine together to create challenging puzzles that will test your logic and reasoning.

name: Hentai Golf: Golf Ball Set 6
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Golf: Golf Ball Set 5
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Golf: Golf Ball Set 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Golf: Golf Ball Set 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Golf: Golf Ball Set 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Golf: Golf Ball Set 1
description: Sin descripción

name: NBA 2K25: All-Star Edition
description: Headline the NBA All-Star team and become the best of the best with the NBA 2K25 All-Star Edition. The All-Star Edition includes 100,000 Virtual Currency (VC), the 2K25 MyTEAM Promo Box, and a host of MyCAREER consumables and cosmetics!

name: Daylight Dread
description: Sin descripción

name: Operation Bodycam
description:
"Operation Bodycam" offers an immersive first-person experience where players step into the role of a special unit officer, equipped with a body-worn camera that records all actions for later review. The game features realistic, tactical missions based on real-life police scenarios, such as hostage rescues and raids, requiring strategic planning and quick decision-making.

Players must navigate dynamic environments, adapt to various settings, and coordinate with AI teammates to succeed. Each choice has significant consequences, influencing the storyline and mission outcomes. A skill progression system allows for customization and improvement, while realistic graphics and sound add to the intensity of the experience.

name: Math Seeker
description: Push the boxes and solve the math puzzles! Here, you will enjoy the charm of math seamlessly woven into the gameplay. A variety of boxes and mechanisms infused with mathematical elements await your discovery. Unleash your wit, unravel the game's secrets, and claim the crown of math!

name: Good Night Pan Pan
description: Explore and investigate the dimly lit halls of a nearly abandoned shopping mall in cyberpunk Hong Kong all while being stalked by a mysterious Yuan Gui, a malevolent spirit hell-bent on taking your soul. Good Night Pan Pan is a short 3rd person survival horror homage to Cantonese horror and culture!

name: 8 Ball Goal
description: Kick the white ball as best you can and score the goal before time runs out.

name: Chuzzo
description: Drop pucks. Score points. It's Chuzzo time.

name: The No No Man
description: A terrifying Indie horror experience with puzzle-platforming that will keep you on your toes as you find your way through the decrepit house. The only guidance you'll have going forward is your own wit and possibly the world's worst flashlight. But make no mistake, this is HIS house.

name: Rabbit in Dungeon
description: A Little Rabbit Battles Ruthless Skeletons! Escape the Grasps of Numerous Skeletons, Flee the Dungeon, and Reveal Hidden Secrets.

name: VR Ninja Dojo
description: VR NINJA DOJO offers an exciting training program that uses your entire body. Heated melee combat wielding swords, precise long-range attacks with shurikens, evasion training to dodge enemy attacks, and training to master ninjutsu await you.

name: The Cool Guys Are Level 100
description: The goal of this game is in it's name. Hack and slash through randomized stages with 8 different playable characters each with their own unique playstyles. Will you be able to reach level 100 without dying and (possibly) become a cool guy?

name: Glowie Shooter
description: They glow in the dark and they are coming to get you. You'll need to endure the relentless waves of upcoming glowies. Can you survive the night and get them before they get you?

name: Mr. Triangle The Pizza Delivery Guy Mania Simulator 2k17 Turbo HD Remix GOTY 2024 Edition: Coked Up + 1.5 Collection DX Directors Cut & Knuckles
description:
The first game in the Mr. Triangle Mania series (a sequel to some games I made as a child, of which the 6th entry was never finished), ported to the second's engine.
Including the extra story Mr. Triangle Mania 1.5, originally an SRB2 mod, now with its original intended ending.

name: Tailwinds
description:
Welcome to Tailwinds, a Pilotwings-inspired mod for Sonic Robo Blast 2,
featuring a story loosely based on the little-known Chuck Yeager origin story.

name: Grid Glyphs
description: Grid Glyphs is a nonogram-style puzzle game for the Playdate.

name: JettFuel
description: In JettFuel, you play as Jett: a robot used by a factory until its sudden closure. You managed to escape the factory before it was destroyed, but the whereabouts of your brother and fellow coworker Brody, are unknown. In order to reunite with Brody, Jett must collect the Power Gems, which are scattered across many different areas, with some being held by bosses. The gems give the user the power to make one wish. There are also 3 hidden Caged Whisps, creatures made of pure light. in the game to try to find!

name: Buffet Boss: Rolling Sushi
description: A brand-new sushi restaurant has arrived, and it's time to dive into exciting new challenges! Players can master the art of delicious sushi rolls just like a pro sushi chef, create refreshing bubble tea that will have customers coming back for more, use a conveyor belt to serve guests efficiently and keep things moving smoothly, and expand their restaurant to become the top dining destination in the city. Rise to the occasion, build your reputation, and become the ultimate sushi and bubble tea sensation.

name: Cooking Arena Pancake Paradise
description:
Your adventure begins with Food Truck Tycoon. Cook, chop, bake and enjoy hundreds of unique dishes. But the journey of a thousand dishes is just the beginning!

As you hone your cooking skills and build your reputation with food trucks, you'll be given the opportunity to explore more gourmet games as DLC. Customize your kitchen with countless upgrades and serve delicious food in different locations. Keep the grill hot, keep your customers smiling, sauté, mix and serve to the top.

name: Rooftop Rascal: The Drizzle Cat
description:
In "Rooftop Rascal: The Drizzle Cat," you control a clever cat navigating city buildings' fire escape stairs to the rooftop.

The gameplay centers on jumps, and quick thinking.
Your goal is to climb as high as you can and reach the rooftop.

developers.name: Christian Marcell de Oliveira trading as chroda

name: Spelunky64
description:
Spelunky is a cave exploration / treasure-hunting game inspired by classic platform games and roguelikes, where the goal is to grab as much treasure from the cave as possible. Every time you play the cave's layout will be different. Use your wits, your reflexes, and the items available to you to survive and go ever deeper! Perhaps at the end you may find what you're looking for...

Paul Koller brings you the official Commodore 64 port of Spelunky. You can now play the classic roguelike how it would be intended on the best-selling 8bit computer!

name: Blobun
description: You are a blob bunny. Your goal? Touch every tile!

name: Adventure Kitty: Drill Buster - Lights Out
description: Get ready to dive back into the fast-paced world of Adventure Kitty: Drill Buster! This thrilling drilling game takes you on an exciting journey through unique biomes where danger lurks at every turn. In this chapter, Carton and Felicity have retrieved the Earth element, but their adventure is far from over. Now, they must brave the treacherous Lab Biome, a high-tech environment filled with perilous machines and cunning enemies determined to stop them from reaching their goal.

name: Megaman X: Omega Blaster - Definitive Edition
description: Megaman X Omega Blaster is an Arcade/Arena style fangame inspired by the classic saga arcades (Megaman: The power Battle & Megaman 2: The power fighters) but focused on the X saga but more dynamic, fun, challenging and with improved graphics.

name: Run from the Feds!
description: Third person 3D platformer with the goal being get to the end as fast as possible.

name: Chimp Test
description: Chimp Test is an innovative and engaging memory challenge game designed to push the boundaries of your cognitive abilities and thoroughly test your short-term memory skills. Inspired by the exceptional memory feats of chimpanzees, who have demonstrated remarkable ability in recalling complex sequences with astonishing speed and precision, Chimp Test offers a unique and interactive experience for players of all ages. Whether you are a casual gamer looking for an entertaining challenge or a dedicated enthusiast aiming to sharpen your mental acuity, this game provides a dynamic platform to enhance memory, concentration, and mental agility.

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Super Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Moto Rush GT: Advanced Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Fashion Girls: Silver Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Ultimate Holidays
description: Let’s start the Ultimate Holidays wherever you are!

name: Blocks Challenge
description:
Blocks Challenge is a game where you will have to use all your wisdom and skill to put together 3 or more pieces of the same number to make them increase.

The goal of the game is to make as many combinations as possible while you have room on the board.

The game has global rankings and monthly prizes.

name: Fruboom
description: Toss fruits to find their matching pairs! As you play, the fruits change color and become trickier to match, adding an exciting challenge. Designed with young players in mind, it’s a simple, kid-friendly experience perfect for even the littlest hands. Bright visuals and easy-to-understand gameplay make it a joyful adventure for all ages!

name: Epstein 2
description: Join detective Michael in his psychological horror-filled adventure to gather evidence and find his mother on Epstein's dark island. In this single-player game, read notes carefully, collect equipment to protect yourself from aggressive test subjects, and uncover the truth...

name: RGG Checkers
description: A multiplayer checkers game for up to eight players, two on each team. The moves are not made step-by-step, but are made through the passing of video games. The winner is the one who has taken all the checkers of all opponents.

name: What Happened: Through Worlds
description: Delve into a digital odyssey of discovery and unravel the mystery!

name: Aero The Acro-Bat 2
description: Remaster of Aero The Acro-Bat 2.

name: Guntris
description: Blast your way through a low poly Western world in this thrilling Tetris style adventure. Use your six-shooter to clear lines and outlaws. Enjoy fast-paced action, stunning visuals, and unique gameplay. Saddle up, download Guntris today, and become the ultimate sharpshooting legend!

name: Banana & Tomato
description: Banana & Tomato is a clicker game, in which you need to click on magic Banamatos to gain even more Banamatos! Play longer and click more often to get more unique items! Welcome to Banana & Tomato world!

name: Escape Gaia
description: you will play as Gaia, the shattered will of a planet, and command your spaceship to explore new worlds, collect and refine various resources, build a home on the damaged spacecraft, summon a wide range of monsters, and ultimately, devour other shattered wills to repair yourself.

name: Alon
description: Dive into non-stop battles against endless waves of enemies. Use a variety of weapons and powers, customize your character, and discover new strategies.

name: Gnomes vs. Knights
description: Clash in the magical Forest of Whimsy! Play as Zigs, a sarcastic gnome wizard with a butterfly net, or Sir Clankalot, a bumbling knight. Catch magical creatures, outsmart your opponent, and decide the forest's fate in this whimsical online PvP adventure. Magic or might – who will prevail?

name: NBA 2K25
description: Stack wins, raise banners, and make history in NBA 2K25. Command every court with authenticity and realism Powered by ProPLAY, giving you ultimate control over how you play in NBA 2K25. Define your legacy in MyCAREER, MyTEAM, MyNBA, and The W.

name: Ace Attorney Investigations 2: Prosecutor's Gambit
description: Prosecutor's Gambit is the second of Edgeworth's solo outings. Featuring new characters and the new "Mind Chess" gameplay mechanic, this title also expands on the crime scene re-creation gameplay mechanic introduced in the first entry. With his right to investigate crimes stripped from him, Edgeworth is left wondering if he should continue to pursue the truth as a prosecutor or as a defense attorney. Just what will his ultimate answer be...?

name: Ace Attorney Investigations Collection
description: EUREKA! Miles Edgeworth moves beyond the courtroom and straight to the crime scene in Ace Attorney Investigations Collection with revamped graphics, new language options, bonus features, and more! Featuring two remastered titles - Ace Attorney Investigations: Miles Edgeworth and the Western debut of Ace Attorney Investigations 2: Prosecutor's Gambit - it's a perfect package.

name: Break the Empire
description: A straight forward, action-rougelite game. No lore, no story, no choices other than how to build your character and how to kill/conquer. Permadeath, unique builds, wild combinations and high replayability!

name: Illuminati Online
description: Destroy the organization aiming to establish a New World Order! Choose your race against the sinful leaders of the Illuminati: "Ball Gates, Epstein, Rockafeller." Will you join the human resistance to fight against them, or side with the Reptilian race to destroy and replace the Illuminati?

name: Astro Bot
description: Buckle up for some epic PlayStation camaraderie, join forces with your favourite PlayStation icons and show the universe that small is mighty in this fresh new Astro adventure, exclusive to PS5 consoles!

name: Aura: Hentai Cards - Horny Madness
description: In the wastelands of Pentarull there is a town "El Drakio", under the control of Sevilla. Strange things are happening - people are horny! What is going on in the town, and is Sevilla involved? The hero will set out to investigate the strange phenomena of the HORNY MADNESS!

name: Seductress
description: Create the desired character and send her to explore and fight with aroused humans and monsters. Become the heroine and seduce as many creatures as possible, she will be punished after defeated and enjoy the interactions with them.

name: Cards of Heart
description: Cards of Heart is a narrative-focused cozy digital card game mixed with a fantasy top-down RPG about a young woman’s daily mental health struggles against her inner Shadows.

name: Sugar Tanks Arena
description: SugarTanks-Arena is an intense, fast-paced, and super-sweet tank arena shooter.Defeat all enemy tanks while dodging their bouncing bullets.Level by level they will get faster, smarter and deadlier.

name: Paper Plane Arena: A Medieval Fantasy
description: Paper Plane Arena is an interactive game experience that is designed to ease your mind and have fun popping innocent balloons. You jump into the role of a little paper plane that is supposed to rescue the world from little but evil balloon demons by dashing through them.

name: Guns & Draguns
description: Experience the thrill of teamwork and competition in Guns And Draguns, a roguelite shooting game. Navigate through a perilous fantasy dungeon, defeat enemies together, and gather upgrades to defeat the final boss. But don't trust your friends too much; you all aim to be the best player!

name: Mirage Feathers
description: Maybe one day, I won't have to fight when I fly.

name: LoveXLust
description: Welcome to LoveXLust, where desire steals the spotlight! Immerse yourself in the ultimate VR adventure that's more than just a game, where you can unlock your deepest fantasies and experience love, lust, and endless excitement. Dive in, and let your desires come to life!

name: Scourge of War: Remastered
description: Welcome to Scourge of War, a real-time 3D computer game/simulation developed by NorbSoftDev, the company headed by renowned game designer Norb Timpko, designer of Mad Minute Games' acclaimed Take Command series. Scourge of War is the epitome of historical command simulations.

name: Battlecry Berserkers
description: A never repeating dungeon. Fight your way trough waves of enemies and make your own path. Unleash new powers and defeat mighty foes, in order to find and take to the gods' justice the responsible for this attack!

name: The Neverwhere Tales : Book 1
description: The Neverwhere Tales - Book 1 is a story-driven Adult Visual Novel. The story takes place in an urban fantasy setting and combines a modern world with fantasy elements. Book 1 is the story of Alexander Callister and how he learns about this hidden world called "Neverwhere."

name: Space Crab VS
description: Battle against other crabs with time tested arcade action! Form galactic partnerships and starlight rivalries in the story mode, or battle against other players locally with more than 20 unlockable crabs- some strange, some powerful.

name: Thunder Jumper
description: Rocket, hook, and pound your way all across the land to destroy Motorhead's evil expansion of factories! Speedrunners beware: There is no max velocity. Can you handle the power of lightning speed?

name: Meander Land
description: Meander Land is a remake of Anjelo's Province with new original characters, a new story, and a ton of quality-of-life improvements.

name: Monica's Newlywed Life
description: When Kyle and his party's adventure comes to an abrupt end, Kyle decides to ask Monica to marry him. Starting a new life in the countryside, they must earn a living, and get to know their new home.

name: Smells Like a Mushroom
description: The Milky Way has become infested with creatures called Magic Mushrooms. To prevent a catastrophe, the brave Carrotado goes into space! Third-person sci-fi shooter with a bizarre story for a single-player and co-op.

name: Buffet Boss
description: Cook your way to the top and rule the restaurant scene!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II - Collector's Edition
description: The collector’s edition of Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 includes a statue of Lieutenant Titus fighting a Tyranid, a 64-page hardcover book, a Steelbook, and the the Macragge’s Chosen DLC.

name: Roots of Yggdrasil
description: Ragnarok is over. The gods have fallen and the World Tree lays shattered. Against all odds, only a Viking tribe remains, caught in an endless loop at the end of time. Can they break the cycle and rebuild their broken home?

name: Perennial Order
description: Perennial Order is an atmospheric One-Hit-Death Boss Rush, set in a verdant Dark Age world. Explore a lore-filled and eldritch land alone or with a friend. Slay nature-infested horrors, creatures, and titans, all in a painterly 2D style.

name: The Corpsmen
description: The Corpsmen is a deck-building roguelite where you build and lead a team of creatures to fight, hunt and harvest other monsters. Your creatures will grow and learn new skills according to how you construct them. Craft unique creatures and decks, and venture forth into the unknown.

name: UFL: Club
description: Do you want to enter the game fully prepared? Pre-order the UFL club pack now and be the first on the pitch!

name: UFL: Ultimate UFL club
description: Do you want to enter the game fully prepared? Pre-order the Ultimate UFL club pack now and be the first on the pitch!

name: UFL: Foundation
description: Do you want to enter the game fully prepared? Pre-order the UFL Foundation pack now and be the first on the pitch!

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - Kamen Rider Opening Theme Songs Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Skoof Simulator
description: Are you Skoof?

name: Mutant Crisis
description: If you like to fight zombies purely, and hope to have talents and attribute growth, be able to unlock epic weapons for free that previously required a recharge of $3888 in krypton gold games, and be able to cooperate with friends online to challenge BOSS, then don't miss this game.

name: The Wicked Father
description:
Playing the unconsionable character of the title who has taken out insurance on both his house and family, you enter his world the moment after he has just trapped them in the basement and flooded the property. A delicious profit surely awaits!

Aim for the door (a dot!) in each room. Water rises incessantly, filling the house; languish for too long and you'll drown. There are five floors in the building; played on difficulty setting A (advanced), after every four rooms you'll escape to the next floor and the water level will drop a bit, bestowing some much-needed breath-related respite. Playing on difficulty setting B (beginner), the water level resets on each screen.

Left and right does what you'd expect. When you're not submerged, the fire button will let you jump. When underwater, you'll start to run out of breath, so repeatedly hammer the fire button to swim up. When you reach the surface either jump out to land on a platform, or slowly pulse the fire button to bob on the top of the water. When you leave the water your lungs will return to fine fettle.

name: Grim Omens
description:
Set in a realm of eternal night, Grim Omens puts the player in the shoes of a fledgling vampire, a creature of blood and darkness struggling to maintain the grip on their fading humanity in a mysterious and hostile world.

The game combines classic dungeon crawling elements, familiar turn-based combat mechanics, and various tabletop and boardgame influences to create an immersive and accessible old-school RPG experience.

name: Brawl Stars: SpongeBob
description: Sin descripción

name: A Night With: Spirit
description: Trapped within an old television, a ghostly girl with a mysterious past, awaits a player who can help her break free.

name: Celestial Crown
description: Celestial Crown is a roguelike deckbuilder where your deck can change completely between fights. Switch your equipment to cover your weaknesses, create powerful combos, and counter other decks.

name: Golf With Your Friends: Olympus Odyssey Course
description: A call from the Gods has been made and you and your friends have been summoned! The new Olympus Odyssey Premium DLC Course offers 18 brand new holes.

name: Golf With Your Friends: Legends of Olympus Pack
description: Dress to impress with the brand new Legends of Olympus Pack. After thousands of years its safe to say these items will never go out of style, and all in a monstrously good selection.

name: Kreton La Resistance
description: Save the Moles from prison and escape from the 19th century!

name: In My Head
description: You have been sent photographs of a place where, according to rumors, an artifact of an ancient civilization is hidden... Do you dare to go there?!

name: Drone Simulator VR
description: Delivers a realistic VR drone flying experience for both beginners and seasoned pilots. The simulation features accurate flight dynamics, with three control modes and flight modes like Tripod, Position, and Sport. Players can explore various maps, tackle challenges, take photos with adjustable camera settings, and find hidden collectibles. Time trials of varying difficulty allow players to test their skills.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Dungeons of Infinity
description:
This game is a procedurally-generated rogue-like ‘Link to the Past’ dungeon crawler. It’s not a rom hack, it was created in Gamemaker Studio from scratch using the original assets. Many new features and assets were added to this game, but special care was put in to ensure it still looks, feels, and plays like the original game.

The goal of the game is to descend through the many enemy-infested dungeons to defeat Link’s nemesis, Aghanim. Along the way you will find many weapons, items, and treasures that will help you along your quest.

name: Hit of Chernobyl
description: Hit of Chernobyl is a Survival FPS. The action takes place in the Zone, which was heavily polluted after a mysterious disaster. Marauders, journalists and just adventurers began to illegally enter the Zone. Many of them disappeared without a trace, and some lucky ones returned with unique artifacts.

name: Investigation
description: Investigation is a singleplayer body-cam styled psychological horror game about searching for clues and answers while a demonic killer brings these gruesome victims back to life in terrifying ways. Solve the puzzles or be consumed by them....

name: Obduracy
description: This game is a pixelated adventure where you play as a gun-toting explorer.

name: Resplendent
description: This game is a delightful blend of pixel art and fast-paced gameplay.

name: Almost Reversi
description: This is a board game that combines deck building and Reversi. Buy powerful stones from the store and try to win 12 times within your time limit of 12 minutes!

name: Stay Home It Rains Outside
description: Your digital refuge at the Alpha Centauri settlement. Visit whenever things aren't going well. This is a productivity tool with game elements. Customize your second body, gather fluffy creatures, and tackle real-life tasks using built-in productivity features.

name: Final Tank
description: This is a top-down barrage shooting Roguelike game. You will experience driving a tank in a dangerous post apocalyptic wasteland to dodge enemy bullets and use weapons such as cannons and machine guns to defeat enemies and save the world

name: Purple Game
description: Purple Game is a JRPG about a castle that has turned pink overnight.

name: WorldNeverland: Elnea Kingdom - Ancestral Garb Set: Berry
description: Sin descripción

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Costume "Holy Knight"
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Girls: Lovely Lieutenant
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Mahjongus: Mystery of Fortescue
description: Uncover the mystery of Fortescue solving classic mahjong puzzles

name: Ark: Aberration Ascended
description: On Aberration, survivors face exotic and extreme challenges within a vast underground biome system upon a derelict, malfunctioning ARK. Survivors will uncover the ultimate secrets of the ARKs, and discover what the future holds in store for those strong and clever enough to survive!

name: GhoulScrapers
description:
Ghoulscrapers is a precision platformer where you play as Eggroll, the new employee at Ghoulscrapers.
You owe the government one gazillion dollars and it's your job to pay the debt before it's too late!

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Visitors from Morta
description: A window into another world has opened among the wastelands of the Worldwound

name: GigaBash: Mighty DLC - R.O.J.A.K & Balzarr
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Lead Angle
description:
"LEAD ANGLE" is a gun shooting game released by SEIBU KAIHATSU in 1988. You control the main character, GEORGE PHOENIX, and fight against gangsters.

Use pistols, grenades, machine guns, and shotguns to defeat the big boss "KING in the final stage.

name: Night of the Dead Simulator
description:
Grab a weapon and follow us - doomsday is here, and time is running out!

The end of the human race is near. The zombie attack threatens our future, but there is hope. You, a soldier from the DELTA team, hold the cure in your hands. Will you be the one to save the world?

Use your weapons, search for and keep track of your ammo, and reach your objective several kilometers to the east. Hurry up and get a move on—time waits for no one.

Does anyone know how to dispatch a zombie? Face hordes of hundreds of zombies in an immersive bodycam experience.

Have some fun while you’re at it. Zombies are clumsy, and you're an expert in destruction, but don't forget that the end of the world is lurking around the corner. Make the most of what you’ve got around you!

name: Tsetesg's Adventure
description: Tsetseg, the little witch, is in crisis. Her friends are taken and converted by the Mad Wizard. Explore castle, fight Bosses, rescue friends, regain special power, and defeat Mad Wizard!

name: Flick Erasers Battle Royale
description:
It's a classwide eraser battle!
Be the last one surviving!
Get ready for a battle royale right on your desk!

name: Eggconsole Hydlide MSX
description: Operate the hero Jim and defeat the demon Varalys, the strongest in mythology! A classic action RPG representing the 1980s.

name: Physiblock
description: A physics-based first person parkour puzzle game, go through various tests as a test robot and be careful not to fall into the water, not to get caught by other robots and to use objects that will help you cross carefully, the game will be released on itch.io on September 5th, would you like to see what life is like through the eyes of a robot? Then grab your computers and wait for September 5th!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Drudging, Drifting, Dreaming
description:
Version 7.7 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes
• New Part 2 Story Chapter IV: A Shore Under Watch
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Schicksal's Imperative (Theresa)
• New Featured Event: Born From A Dream
• ...and more!

name: Shiren the Wanderer 6: Toguro Island Exploration Record Plus Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Animal Water Pang!
description: Combine cute animal plushies to earn points and create larger plushies! Try not to let the plushies spill out of the claw machine on your quest for a high score.

name: Badminton Time
description: Get ready to move your arms to hit the badminton shuttlecock and become the new champion!

name: Only Up Rush
description: Jump, parkour and compete against yourself in thousands of metres of tough challenges. Race the clock, beat it, break records and reach unprecedented heights!

name: Think or Die Collection Pack
description: Discover 4 games to rack your brain!

name: Adrenaline Collection Pack
description: Discover 4 unique games to release adrenaline!

name: Scotland Yard: Hunting Mister X
description: Find Mister X in Scotland Yard’s trickiest case yet! Mister X has gone underground somewhere in London, and the only clues are the tickets he carelessly threw away. But where did he use them? Look! There! Was that a quick glimpse of him?

name: Zerouno Games Collection Pack 1
description: Discover 9 amazing games!

name: Mansion Restorator
description: Become a one-person house flipper. Buy, repair, and renovate neglected mansions. Restore these grand estates to their former glory and sell them for a profit

name: Noroi E: Darkness
description:
In "Noroi E: Darkness", you immerse yourself in the shoes of Detective Juárez, a private detective who has been investigating paranormal cases since he was fired from the police department. One night, you receive a desperate call from a mother worried about the disappearance of her son, Oscar García, in a small, bleak town in northern Mexico called Santa Anna.

Arriving at the scene, you find a gloomy environment, decrepit buildings and an atmosphere full of mystery. Your mission is to discover what happened to Oscar and solve the dark secret behind his disappearance.

name: Starwave
description: STARWAVE launches you into a cosmic voyage of high-energy music and exhilarating freeform movement. Feel the rhythm of the universe as you soar through distant galaxies bringing color and light to the night sky.

name: Gimmick! 2
description: Embark on a sparkling journey in this long-awaited sequel to SUNSOFT’s legendary 8-bit platformer Gimmick! Solve puzzles, trick enemies, and explore a physics-based playground. Yumetaro is back!

name: The Hardest Game in the Universe: DLC 3
description: The DLC 3 for "The Hardest Game in the Universe" has arrived, bringing an extra dose of difficulty and challenging new enemies. Get ready to tackle complex environments, new traps, and a variety of cunning adversaries.

name: Netflix Stories: Selling Sunset
description: Sin descripción

name: Fields of Asphodel
description: Fields of Asphodel is a 1.3 million-word interactive novel by JJ Laurier. It's entirely text-based, without graphics or sound effects, and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.
